English: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
Basque: Hantik bi egünen bürüan, Bazko Jeia eta Altxatürazigabeko Ogien Jeia ospatzen ziren. Apezbürü eta lege irakasleak Jesüs maltzürkeriaz nola bahitüko züen zebiltzan, eraiteko.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
Basque: Zonbaitek, kexü, hola zioen algarri: «Zerentako hola auherrik gal lürrün hori?
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
Basque: Hiruehün denarioz goiti sal zeitekean eta diharüa behartsüer eman.» Eta marmar ari ziren emaztearen kontre.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Bena Jesüsek erran zeien: «Ütz ezazüe bakean; zerentako ehelegatzen düzüe? Egintza hona egin dü enetako.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Bena Jesüsek erran zeien: «Ütz ezazüe bakean; zerentako ehelegatzen düzüe? Egintza hona egin dü enetako.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
Basque: Ezi, behartsüak beti züen artean dütükezüe, eta nahi düzüenean honki egin dizakeezüe. Bena ni ez naüzüe orozbatkoz züeki.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
Basque: Judas Iskariote, Hamabietarik bat, apezbürüengana joan zen, Jesüs haien esküetara emaiteko asmütan.
remarks_sem: Reinforcement by means of the postposition ASMOTAN
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
Basque: Altxatürazigabeko Ogien Jeiko lehen egüna zen, Bazko bildotsa eraiten zeneko egüna. Dizipülüek erran zeioen Jesüsi: «Non egin behar dütügü Bazko aiharialako antolaketak?»
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
Basque: Eta erran zeien: «Hau ene odola da, Jinkoarekilanko batarzüna berritüko düana, güzientako ixuria.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
Basque: Zauzte iratzarri eta otoitz egizüe, tentaldian ez erorteko; gogoz kartsü izanik ere, ahül beita gizakia.»
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Jesüsek erran zeien: «Ezpata eta makileki jin zirae, ohoi baten bila bezala, ene hartzera!
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Jesüsek erran zeien: «Ezpata eta makileki jin zirae, ohoi baten bila bezala, ene hartzera!
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
Basque: hanitxek haren kontre gezürrezko jakilegoak egin bazütüen ere, haien jakilegoak ez ziren bat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
Basque: Zonbaitek xütitü eta gezürrezko jakilegoa hau egin züen Jesüsen kontre:
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
Basque: Ordüan, apez nausiak, biltzarrearen erditan xütik, galtatü zeion Jesüsi: «Ez ahal deiezü deüs ere ihardetsi behar zure kontre elkitzen dütüener?»
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.
Basque: Apezbürüek salakeria hanitx egiten züen haren kontre.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
Basque: Pilatok erran zeion: «Ez ahal düzüa deüs ihardetsi behar? Sogizü zonbat gaüzaz ogendant jarten zütüen.»
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.
Basque: Ontsa bazakian apezbürüek bekaixkeriaz eman zeioela Jesüs.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
Basque: Ordüan, Pilatok, jenteari kausitzeagatik, Barrabas libratü zeien eta Jesüs, azotarazi ondoan, haien esküetara eman züan, kürütxitza lezaen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
Basque: Aski ihakin egin ondoan, gorribizizko jauntsia elki zeioen eta bere soinekoak jarri zeitzoen. Gero, elk eta kürütxean itzatzeko eraman züen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.
Basque: Itzatü züen kürütxean, eta haren jauntsiak bederazkatü zütüen, zer zoinentako txotxak eginez.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
Basque: Hiruetan, Jesüsek oihü handiz erran züan: ˝Eloi, Eloi, lema sabaktani?˝ (Hau da: Ene Jinkoa, ene Jinkoa, zergatik ützi naüzü?)
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.
Basque: Neskanegüna igaran zenean, Magdalako Mariak, Maria Jakoben amak eta Salomek ürringozoko ünküteak erosi zütüen, Jesüsen korpitzaren gantzützeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenik, Hameker agertü zeien, mahainean jarririk zaudelarik, eta gaizkiak erran zeitzen beren sinestegabeaz eta beren bürügogorkeriaz, piztürik ikusi züenak sinetsi ez zütüelakoz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenik, Hameker agertü zeien, mahainean jarririk zaudelarik, eta gaizkiak erran zeitzen beren sinestegabeaz eta beren bürügogorkeriaz, piztürik ikusi züenak sinetsi ez zütüelakoz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Interconfessional Translation into Souletin Basque
author: Casenave-Harigile

English: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
Basque: Batheiatzen ari zen Joanes desertuan, eta predikatzen zuen emendamendutako baptismoa bekhatuén barkhamendutan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also: for therefore came I forth.
Basque: Orduan dioste Goazen hurbilengo burguetara: han ere predika dezadanzat: ezen hartakotzat ilkhi izan naiz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And saith unto him, See thou say nothing to any man: but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
Basque: Eta erran ziezón, Begirauk nehori deus ezterroan: baina oha, eta erakuts akio Sakrifikadoreari, eta presenta itzak eure garbitzeagatik Moisesek manatu dituen gauzak haei testimoniajetan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.
Basque: Eta zeren ezin hurbil baitzakidizkion jendetzearen kausaz, ager zezaten Jesus zen etxe gaina, eta hura zulhaturik, erauts zezaten paralitikoa zetzan ohea.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
Basque: Zergatik haur hunela blasfemio erraiten ari da? Nork bekhatuak barkha ahal ditzake Jainkoak berak baizen?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Why reason ye these things in your hearts?
Basque: Eta bertan ezaguturik Jesusek bere spirituaz, ezen hala zihardukatela berak baithan, erran ziezen, Zergatik horrelako gauzez dihardukazue zuen bihotzetan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners, they said unto his disciples, How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners?
Basque: Eta Skribék eta Fariseuék ikhusirik publikanoekin eta jende bizitze gaixtotakoekin jaten zuela, erran ziezén haren diszipuluei, Zergatik publikanoekin eta bizitze gaixtotakoekin jaten du eta edaten?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast, but thy disciples fast not?
Basque: Eta Joanesen eta Fariseuén diszipuluék barur egiten zutén: eta hek ethorten dirade eta diotsate, Zergatik Joanesen eta Fariseuen diszipuluék barur egiten dute, eta hire diszipuluék ezpáitute barurik egiten?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Behold, why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful?
Basque: Eta Fariseuék erran ziezoten, Horrá, zergatik egiten duté Sabathoan egin sori eztena?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Gero erran ziezén: Sabathoa gizonagatik egin izan da, ez gizona Sabathoagatik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Gero erran ziezén: Sabathoa gizonagatik egin izan da, ez gizona Sabathoagatik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
Basque: Bada gizonaren Semea Sabathoaren ere jabe da.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man,
Basque: Eta hetarát inguru behaturik aserrerekin, eta haien bihotzeko obstinazioneaz kontristaturik, diotsa gizonari: Heda ezak eure eskua. Eta heda zezan, eta haren eskua, berzea bezain senda zedin.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
Basque: Orduan ilkhirik Fariseuék, bertan Herodianoekin konseillu eduki zezaten haren kontra, hura hil lezatenzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
Basque: Eta erran ziezén bere diszipuluei unzixo bat bethi prest eduki lekión, jendetzearen kausaz, hers ez lezatenzát.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Eta ordena zitzan hamabi harekin izateko, eta predikatzera igorteko
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Eta ordena zitzan hamabi harekin izateko, eta predikatzera igorteko
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.
Basque: Eta haur enzun zutenean haren ahaideak ilkhi zitezen hatzaman lezatenzat: ezen erraiten zuten, zoratu zela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.
Basque: Ezen baldin resuma bat bere kontra partitua bada, ezin dauke resuma hura.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.
Basque: Eta baldin etxe bat bere kontra partitua bada, ezin dauke etxe hura.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.
Basque: Hala baldin Satan ere altxa badadi eta partitua bada bere kontra, ezin dauke, baina fin du.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: No man can enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
Basque: Ezin nehork borthitz baten ostillamenduak, haren etxera sarthurik, pilla ahal ditzake, baldin lehen borthitza esteka ezpadeza: eta orduan haren etxea pillaturen du.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: Baina nork ere blasfematuren baitu Spiritu sainduaren kontra eztu barkhamendurik ukhanen sekulan, baina izanen da kondemnazione eternalaren hogendun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: Baina nork ere blasfematuren baitu Spiritu sainduaren kontra eztu barkhamendurik ukhanen sekulan, baina izanen da kondemnazione eternalaren hogendun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta berzea eror zedin lur onera, eta eman zezan fruktu goratzen eta handitzen zenik, eta ekhar zezan bihi batak hogei eta hamar, eta berzeak hirurogei, eta berzeak ehun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word's sake, immediately they are offended.
Basque: Eta eztute errorik berak baithan, baina iraute gutitako dirade: gero heltzen denean tribulazionerik edo persekuzionerik hitzagatik, bertan skandalizatzen dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And these are they which are sown on good ground; such as hear the word, and receive it, and bring forth fruit, some thirtyfold, some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta hauk dirade lur onera hazia rezebitu dutenak, zeinék hitza enzuten baitute, eta rezebitzen, eta fruktu ekharten, batak hogei eta hamar, eta berzeak hirurogei, eta berzeak ehun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta erran ziezén: Zergatik zarete horrela izior? Nola eztuzue federik?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta erran ziezén: Zergatik zarete horrela izior? Nola eztuzue federik?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.
Basque: Eta oihuz boz goraz erran zezan: Zer da hire eta ene artean, Jesus Jainko subiranoaren Semea? Adjuratzen aut Jainkoaren partez ez nezan tormenta.
remarks_sem: translation mistake: French prepostion PAR is confused with the noun PART
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing.
Basque: Eta inguru behatzen zuen, haur egin zuena ikhus lezanzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But the woman fearing and trembling, knowing what was done in her, came and fell down before him, and told him all the truth.
Basque: Eta emaztea beldurrik eta ikhararik, nola baitzakian hura baithan egin izan zena, ethor zedin, eta egotz zezan bere burua haren aitzinera, eta erran ziezon egia guzia.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: While he yet spake, there came from the ruler of the synagogue's house certain which said, Thy daughter is dead: why troublest thou the Master any further?
Basque: Oraino hura minzo zela ethor zitezen batzu sinagogako prinzipalarenetik, zioitela: Hire alabá hil duk, zergatik fatigatzen duk Majistrua?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when he was come in, he saith unto them, Why make ye this ado, and weep? the damsel is not dead, but sleepeth.
Basque: Eta sarthurik dioste, Zergatik tormentatzen zarete, eta nigarrez zaudete? Neskatxá ezta hil, baina lo datza.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Is not this the carpenter, the son of Mary, the brother of James, and Joses, and of Juda, and Simon? and are not his sisters here with us? And they were offended at him.
Basque: Ezta haur xarpanter? Mariaren seme, Jakesen eta Josesen eta Judaren eta Simonen anaie? Eztirade hunen arrebak ere hemen gu baithan? Eta skandalizatzen ziraden hartan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he marvelled because of their unbelief.
Basque: Eta miraz zegoén haién inkredulitateagatik, eta inguratzen zituen burguak inguru, irakasten ari zela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey, save a staff only; no scrip, no bread, no money in their purse:
Basque: Eta mana zitzan ez lezaten deus har bidekotzat, makhila hutsa baizen: ez maletarik, ez ogirik, ez dirurik gerrikoan,
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta nork ere rezebituren ezpaitzaituzte, eta zuek ez enzunen, handik partitzean, iharros ezazue zuen oinén azpiko errhautsa, testimoniajetan haién kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta nork ere rezebituren ezpaitzaituzte, eta zuek ez enzunen, handik partitzean, iharros ezazue zuen oinén azpiko errhautsa, testimoniajetan haién kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And king Herod heard of him; (for his name was spread abroad:) and he said, That John the Baptist was risen from the dead, and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.
Basque: Eta enzun zezan rege Herodesek minzatzen (ezen haren izena zen famatua) eta erran zezan, Joanes batheiatzen ari zena, resuszitatu izan da hiletarik, eta halakotz berthuték obratzen duté hartan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Ezen Herodes hunek jende igorririk har zezan Joanes, eta esteka zezan presoindegian, Herodias bere anaie Filiperen emaztearen kausaz, zeren hura emazte hartu baitzuen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Ezen Herodes hunek jende igorririk har zezan Joanes, eta esteka zezan presoindegian, Herodias bere anaie Filiperen emaztearen kausaz, zeren hura emazte hartu baitzuen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him, and would have killed him; but she could not:
Basque: Halakotz Herodias aiher zaión, eta hil erazi nahi zuen, baina ezin zezakeen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Eta Regek hagitz tristeturik, zinagatik eta harekin mahainean jarririk zeudenakgatik, eztu iraitzi nahi ukhan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Eta Regek hagitz tristeturik, zinagatik eta harekin mahainean jarririk zeudenakgatik, eztu iraitzi nahi ukhan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?
Basque: Eta hark ihardesten zuela erran ziezén: Eiezue zuek jatera. Orduan diotsate: Ala joanik erosiren dugu berrehun dineroren ogia, eta emanen drauegu jatera?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Gero interrogatzen dute Fariseuék eta Skribék: Zergatik hire diszipuluak eztabiltza aitzinekoen ordenanzén araura, baina eskuak ikhuzi gabe jaten dute ogia?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Gero interrogatzen dute Fariseuék eta Skribék: Zergatik hire diszipuluak eztabiltza aitzinekoen ordenanzén araura, baina eskuak ikhuzi gabe jaten dute ogia?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Howbeit in vain do they worship me, teaching for doctrines the commandments of men.
Basque: Baina alferretan zerbitzatzen naute, irakasten dituztela doktrinatzat gizonén manamenduak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.
Basque: Erraiten zerauen halaber: Ungi nonbait iraizten duzue Jainkoaren manamendua, zuen ordenanzá begira dezazuenzát.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Basque: Baina zuek diozue: Baldin norbeitek aitari edo amari baderró, Eneganik izanen den korbana (erran nahi baita donoa) probetxaturen zaik, hogen gabe date hura.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition, which ye have delivered: and many such like things do ye.
Basque: Ezdeusten duzuela Jainkoaren hitza zeurok ordenatu duzuen ordenanzáz, eta hunelako berze gauzarik anhitz egiten duzue.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto her, For this saying go thy way; the devil is gone out of thy daughter.
Basque: Orduan erran ziezón: Hitz horrengatik ohá, ilkhi dun deabrua hire alabaganik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he sighed deeply in his spirit, and saith, Why doth this generation seek after a sign? verily I say unto you, There shall no sign be given unto this generation.
Basque: Orduan barnadanik bere spirituan suspirio eginik, erran zezan: Zergatik jenerazione haur signo galdez dago? Egiaz diotsuet jenerazione huni signorik etzaiola emanen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have no bread.
Basque: Eta bazihardukaten elkharren kontra, zioitela: Zeren ogirik eztugun da hori.
gloss: c'est pour ce que nous n'avons point de pains.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have no bread.
Basque: Eta bazihardukaten elkharren kontra, zioitela: Zeren ogirik eztugun da hori.
gloss: c'est pour ce que nous n'avons point de pains.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Eta hori ezagutu zuenean Jesusek, erran ziezen: Zer dihardukazue, zeren ogirik eztuzuen? Oraino eztuzue konsideratzen ez aditzen? Oraino gogortua duzue zuen bihotza?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Eta hori ezagutu zuenean Jesusek, erran ziezen: Zer dihardukazue, zeren ogirik eztuzuen? Oraino eztuzue konsideratzen ez aditzen? Oraino gogortua duzue zuen bihotza?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.
Basque: Borz ogiak hautsi nerauztenean borz milla gizonei zenbat saski zathiz beterik altxatu zentuzten? Diotsate: Hamabi.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.
Basque: Eta zazpiak laur milla gizonei hautsi nerauztenean zenbat saski zathiz betherik altxatu zentuzten? Eta hek erran ziezoten: Zazpi.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Ezen nork ere nahi ukhanen baitu bere bizia salbatu, galduren du hura; baina nork ere galduren baitu bere bizia enegatik eta Ebanjeliogatik, salbaturen du hura.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Ezen nork ere nahi ukhanen baitu bere bizia salbatu, galduren du hura; baina nork ere galduren baitu bere bizia enegatik eta Ebanjeliogatik, salbaturen du hura.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
Basque: Ezen zer probetxu du gizonak, baldin mundu guzia irabaz badeza, eta bere arimá gal badeza?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen nork ere ahalke izanen baita nizaz eta ene hitzéz jenerazione adultera eta bekhatore hunetan, gizonaren Semea ere ahalke izanen da harzaz, dathorrenean bere Aitaren glorian Aingeru sainduekin.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen nork ere ahalke izanen baita nizaz eta ene hitzéz jenerazione adultera eta bekhatore hunetan, gizonaren Semea ere ahalke izanen da harzaz, dathorrenean bere Aitaren glorian Aingeru sainduekin.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen nork ere ahalke izanen baita nizaz eta ene hitzéz jenerazione adultera eta bekhatore hunetan, gizonaren Semea ere ahalke izanen da harzaz, dathorrenean bere Aitaren glorian Aingeru sainduekin.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Orduan Pierrisek hitza harturik diotsa Jesusi: Majistruá, on duk gu hemen garén; egin ditzagun bada hirur tabernakle: bat hire, eta bat Moisesen, eta bat Eliasen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Orduan Pierrisek hitza harturik diotsa Jesusi: Majistruá, on duk gu hemen garén; egin ditzagun bada hirur tabernakle: bat hire, eta bat Moisesen, eta bat Eliasen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Orduan Pierrisek hitza harturik diotsa Jesusi: Majistruá, on duk gu hemen garén; egin ditzagun bada hirur tabernakle: bat hire, eta bat Moisesen, eta bat Eliasen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they asked him, saying, Why say the scribes that Elias must first come?
Basque: Gero interroga zezaten, ziotela: Zergatik dioite Skribék ezen Elias lehen ethorri behar dela?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
Basque: Eta hark ihardesten zuela erran ziezen: Segur Eliasek lehen ethorririk bere staturako ditu gauza guziak: eta skribatua den bezala gizonaren Semeaz, behar da anhitz sufri dezan, eta ezdeusetan eduki dadin.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran ziezón: Baldin hori sinhets ahal badezak, gauza guziak dituk posible sinhesten duenaren.
gloss: toutes les choses sont possibles AU croyant
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
Basque: Eta etxean sarthu zenean, bere diszipuluék interroga zezaten aphart: Zergatik guk hura ezin kanpora egotzi dugu?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But they held their peace: for by the way they had disputed among themselves, who should be the greatest.
Basque: Eta hek ixil zitezen, ezen elkharren kontra iharduki zutén bidean, zein zen berzeak baino handiagoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name, receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me, receiveth not me, but him that sent me.
Basque: Nork ere hunelako haurtxoetarik bat rezebituren baitu ene izenean, ni rezebitzen nau, eta nork ere ni rezebitzen bainau, ez nau ni rezebitzen, baina ni igorri nauena.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And if thy hand offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed, than having two hands to go into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:
Basque: Eta baldin eure eskuak trebuka eraziten bahau, trenka ezak hura: hobe duk hire esku bakhoitzdun bizitzean sar adin, ezen ez bi eskuak dituala gehennara joan adin, behin ere iraungiten ezten sura,
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.
Basque: Eta ihardiesten zuela Jesusek erran ziezén: Zuen bihotzeko gogortasunagatik skribatu drauzue manamendu hori.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;
Basque: Hunegatik, utziren ditu gizonak bere aita eta ama, eta junktaturen zaió bere emazteari.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
Basque: Eta hark erran ziezen: Nork ere utziren baitu bere emaztea, eta berze bat emazte harturen, adulterio jaukiten du haren kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran ziezon: Zergatik deitzen nauk on? Eztuk nehor onik bat baizen, eta hura, Jainkoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
Basque: Orduan Pierris has zedin hari erraiten: Huná, guk utzi zitiagu gauza guziak, eta jarreiki gaitzaizkik hiri.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Eta ihardesten duela Jesusek dio: Egiaz diotsuet, nehor ezta utzi duenik etxea, edo anaieak, edo arrebák, edo aita, edo ama, edo emaztea, edo haurrak, edo landák, ene eta Ebanjelioaren amorekatik.
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Eta ihardesten duela Jesusek dio: Egiaz diotsuet, nehor ezta utzi duenik etxea, edo anaieak, edo arrebák, edo aita, edo ama, edo emaztea, edo haurrak, edo landák, ene eta Ebanjelioaren amorekatik.
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And James and John, the sons of Zebedee, come unto him, saying, Master, we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire.
Basque: Orduan ethorten dirade haregana Jakes eta Joanes Zebedeoren semeak, dioitela: Majistruá, nahi gendikek zer ere eskaturen baikara, egin iezagun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?
Basque: Eta hark erran ziezén: Zer nahi duzue dagizuedan?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
Basque: Baina ene eskuinean edo ene ezkerrean jartea, ezta ene emaiteko, baina emanen zaie preparatu izan zaienei.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen gizonaren Semea ere ezta ethorri zerbitzatu izatera, baina zerbitzatzera, eta bere biziaren anhitzengatik ranzoinetan emaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen gizonaren Semea ere ezta ethorri zerbitzatu izatera, baina zerbitzatzera, eta bere biziaren anhitzengatik ranzoinetan emaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen gizonaren Semea ere ezta ethorri zerbitzatu izatera, baina zerbitzatzera, eta bere biziaren anhitzengatik ranzoinetan emaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen gizonaren Semea ere ezta ethorri zerbitzatu izatera, baina zerbitzatzera, eta bere biziaren anhitzengatik ranzoinetan emaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen gizonaren Semea ere ezta ethorri zerbitzatu izatera, baina zerbitzatzera, eta bere biziaren anhitzengatik ranzoinetan emaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen gizonaren Semea ere ezta ethorri zerbitzatu izatera, baina zerbitzatzera, eta bere biziaren anhitzengatik ranzoinetan emaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou son of David, have mercy on me.
Basque: Eta mehatxatzen zuten anhitzek ixil ledin, baina hark ungiz oihu gehiago egiten zuen, Dabiden semeá, auk pietate nizaz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.
Basque: Eta ihardesten zuela erran ziezón Jesusek: Zer nahi duk dagiadan? Eta itsuak diotsa: Majistruá, ikhustea rezebi dezadan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And if any man say unto you, Why do ye this? say ye that the Lord hath need of him; and straightway he will send him hither.
Basque: Eta baldin nehork badarrazue: Zergatik hori egiten duzue? Errazue ezen Jaunak duela haren beharra, eta bertan hura igorriren du huna.
remarks_sem: versions differ. Perhaps here English preposition OF expresses the agent?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Basque: Eta irakasten ari zen, ziostéla: Ezta skribatua, ezen Ene etxea orazionetako etxe deithuren dela nazione guzietan? Baina zuek hura gaixtagin leze egin duzue.
remarks_sem: versions differ. Perhaps here English preposition OF expresses the agent?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
Basque: Halakotz erraiten drauzuet, zeren ere othoitz egiten duzuela eskaturen baitzarete, sinhetsazue ezen rezebituren duzuela: eta eginen zaizue.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
Basque: Baina othoitz egiten jar zaiteztenean, barkha ezazue baldin deus baduzue nehoren kontra: zuen Aita zeruetakoak ere, zuei barkha dietzazuen zuen faltak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?
Basque: Eta erran ziezoten: Zer autoritatez gauza horiak egiten dituk? Eta nork eman drauk autoritate hori gauza horiak egin ditzán?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
Basque: Eta bazihardukaten elkharren artean, zioitela: Baldin erran badezagu, Zerutik, erranen du Zergatik beraz eztuzue sinhetsi hura?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Baina baldin erran badezagu, Gizonetarik populuaren beldur gara: ezen guziék zadukaten Joanes egiazko Profeta izan zela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Baina baldin erran badezagu, Gizonetarik populuaren beldur gara: ezen guziék zadukaten Joanes egiazko Profeta izan zela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
Basque: Eta igor zezan laborarietara sasoinean zerbitzaria, laborarietarik rezebi lezanzát mahastiko fruktutik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.
Basque: Oraino bada bere seme maite bat ukhan eta, hura ere igorri ukhan du hetara azkenik, zioela: Ahalke izanen dirade ene semearen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Aiher ziraden bada haren hatzamaitera, baina populuaren beldur ziraden, ezen ezagutu zuten haién kontra konparazione haur erran zuela: eta hura utzirik joan zitezen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Aiher ziraden bada haren hatzamaitera, baina populuaren beldur ziraden, ezen ezagutu zuten haién kontra konparazione haur erran zuela: eta hura utzirik joan zitezen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Aiher ziraden bada haren hatzamaitera, baina populuaren beldur ziraden, ezen ezagutu zuten haién kontra konparazione haur erran zuela: eta hura utzirik joan zitezen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, to catch him in his words.
Basque: Gero igor zitzaten harengana Fariseuetarik eta Herodianoetarik batzu, hura hatzaman lezatenzát hitzean.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when they were come, they say unto him, Master, we know that thou art true, and carest for no man: for thou regardest not the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth: Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar, or not?
Basque: Eta hek ethorririk diotsate: Majistruá, bazekiagu ezen egiati aizela, eta nehoren ansiarik eztuála, ezen ez ago gizonén aparenziara beha, baina egiazki Jainkoaren bidea irakasten duk. Bidezko da tributaren Zesari emaitea, ala ez? Emanen dugu, ala eztugu emanen?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Eta hark, ezaguturik haién hipokrisiá, erran ziezén: Zergatik tentatzen nauzue? Ekhardazue dinero bat, ikhus dezadanzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Eta hark, ezaguturik haién hipokrisiá, erran ziezén: Zergatik tentatzen nauzue? Ekhardazue dinero bat, ikhus dezadanzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: Majistruá, Moisesek skribatu ukhan diraukuk, baldin zenbeiten anaiea hil bada, eta utzi badu emaztea, eta haurrik utzi ezpadu, har dezan haren anaiak haren emaztea, eta egin diezón leinu bere anaieri.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: Majistruá, Moisesek skribatu ukhan diraukuk, baldin zenbeiten anaiea hil bada, eta utzi badu emaztea, eta haurrik utzi ezpadu, har dezan haren anaiak haren emaztea, eta egin diezón leinu bere anaieri.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
Basque: Eta ihardesten zuela Jesusek erraiten zuen, tenplean irakasten ari zela: Nola dioite Skribék ezen Krist Dabiden seme dela?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Basque: Iresten dituztela ema alhargunén etxeak, are luzaki othoitz egin irudiz: hauk rezebituren duté kondemnazione handiagoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Ezen altxaturen da nazionea nazionearen kontra, eta resumá resumaren kontra; eta izanen dirade lur ikharatzeak lekhutik lekhura, eta goseteak eta nahastekamenduak; dolorén hatseak, hauk.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Ezen altxaturen da nazionea nazionearen kontra, eta resumá resumaren kontra; eta izanen dirade lur ikharatzeak lekhutik lekhura, eta goseteak eta nahastekamenduak; dolorén hatseak, hauk.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Ezen altxaturen da nazionea nazionearen kontra, eta resumá resumaren kontra; eta izanen dirade lur ikharatzeak lekhutik lekhura, eta goseteak eta nahastekamenduak; dolorén hatseak, hauk.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Baina begira eiezue zuek zeuron buruei, ezen libraturen zaituzte konsistorioetara eta sinagogetara: azotaturen zarete, eta gobernadorén eta regén aitzinera eramanen zarete ene kausaz, haei testimoniajetan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
Basque: Eta nazione guzietan behar da lehenik predikatu Ebanjelioa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
Basque: Orduan libraturen du anaieak anaiea heriotara, eta aiták haurra: eta altxaturen dirade haurrak aita-amén kontra, eta hil eraziren dituzté.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
Basque: Eta gaitzetsiak izanen zarete guziéz, ene izenagatik: baina nork ere perseberaturen baitu finerano, hura salbaturen da.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
Basque: Eta etxe gainean datena, ezalbeiledi jauts etxerát, eta ezalbeiledi sar deusen bere etxetik eramaitera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
Basque: Eta landán datena ezalbeiledi gibelerat itzul, bere abillamenduaren hartzera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
Basque: Ezen izanen dirade egun hek halako tribulazione, nolakorik ezpaita izan Jainkoak kreatu dituen gauzén kreatze hatsetik oraindrano, eta ezpaita izanen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
Basque: Eta baldin Jaunak laburtu ezpalitu egun hek, nehor ez laite salba: baina elejitu dituen elejituakgatik, laburtu ditu egun hek.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
Basque: Ezen altxaturen dirade Krist falsuak, eta profeta falsuak; eta eginen dituzte signoak eta mirakuluak seduzitzeko, baldin posible baliz, elejituen ere.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
Basque: Beilla ezazue beraz: ezen eztakizue noiz etxeko jauna ethorriren den, arratsean, ala gauherditan, ala oillaritean, ala goizean:
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
Basque: Zen bada Bazkoaren eta ogi altxagarri gabekoen bestá bi egunen buruan: eta Sakrifikadore prinzipalak eta Skribák zabiltzan bilha nolatan hura fineziaz hatzamanik hil lezaketen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
Basque: Eta ziraden batzu berak baithan gaitzi zaienik, eta erraiten zutenik: Zertako ungentu goastatze haur egin izan da?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
Basque: Ezen haur hirurehun dinero baino gehiagotan saldu ahal zaten, eta eman paubrei. Eta bazadasaten haren kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Baina Jesusek dio: Utzazue hori, zergatik faxatzen duzue? Obra on bat enegana egin du.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Baina Jesusek dio: Utzazue hori, zergatik faxatzen duzue? Obra on bat enegana egin du.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
Basque: Ezen paubreak bethiere ukhanen dituzue zuekin, eta noiz ere nahi ukhanen baituzue, haei ungi ahal daidiezue: baina ni ez nauzue bethi ukhanen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.
Basque: Hunek ahal duena egin du: abanzatu da ene gorputzaren unktatzera ene ohorztekotzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
Basque: Orduan Judas Iskariot hamabietarik bat ethor zedin Sakrifikadore prinzipaletara, hura libra liezenzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
Basque: Eta altxagarri gabeko ogién lehen egunean, Bazkoa sakrifikatu behar zutenean, erran ziezoten bere diszipuluék: Non nahi duk joanik aphain dezagun jan dezánzat Bazkoa?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
Basque: Eta dioste: Haur da ene odol Testamentu berrikoa, anhitzengatik isurten dena.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.
Basque: Eta erran zezan: Abba, Aitá, gauza guziak posible dituk hire; transporta ezak eneganik kopa haur; badarik ere ez nik nahi dudana, baina hik nahi duana.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
Basque: Beilla ezazue, eta othoitz egizue, sar etzaitezten tentazionetan; spiritua pronpto da, baina haragia flaku.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Eta ihardesten zuela Jesusek erran ziezén: Gaixtagin baten ondoan bezala ilkhi zarete ezpatekin eta uhekin ene hatzamaitera?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Eta ihardesten zuela Jesusek erran ziezén: Gaixtagin baten ondoan bezala ilkhi zarete ezpatekin eta uhekin ene hatzamaitera?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Eta Sakrifikadore prinzipalak, eta konsistorio guzia Jesusen kontra testimoniaje bilha zabiltzan, hura hil erazi lezatenzát, eta etzutén erideiten.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
Basque: Ezen anhitzek falsuki testifikatzen zutén haren kontra, baina etziraden konforme haién testimoniajeak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
Basque: Orduan batzuk jaikirik falsuki testifika zezaten haren kontra, zioitela:
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
Basque: Orduan Sakrifikadore subiranoak artera jaikirik interroga zezan Jesus, zioela: Eztuk deus ihardesten? Zer da hauk hire kontra testifikatzen dutena?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Ye have heard the blasphemy: what think ye? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death.
Basque: Enzun duzue blasfemioa: zer irudi zaizue? Eta hek guziék haren kontra juja zezaten hil merezi zuela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.
Basque: Eta anhitz gauzaz akusatzen zutén hura Sakrifikadore prinzipalék.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
Basque: Eta Pilatek berriz interroga zezan, zioela: Eztuk deus ihardesten? Huná, zenbat gauzaz hire kontra testifikatzen dutén.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.
Basque: (Ezen bazeakian nola hura inbidiaz libratu zutén Sakrifikadore prinzipalék)
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
Basque: Pilatek bada populuaren gogara egin nahiz, larga ziezen Barabbas, eta Jesus azotaturik libra ziezén kruzifika ledinzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And they smote him on the head with a reed, and did spit upon him, and bowing their knees worshipped him.
Basque: Eta bazeraunsaten haren buruari kanabera batez, eta thu egiten zuten haren kontra, eta belhaurikaturik reberenzia egiten zeraukaten.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
Basque: Gero harzaz trufatu ziradenean, eraunz ziezoten eskarlatazkoa, eta bezti zezaten bere abillamenduéz, eta kanporat eraman zezaten kruzifika lezatenzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.
Basque: Eta kruzifikatu zutenean, parti zitzaten haren abillamenduak, zorthe egotzirik haién gainean, nork zer joan lezakeen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
Basque: Eta bedratzi orenetan oihu egin zezan Jesusek ozengi: Eloi, Eloi, lammasabachthani? Erran nahi baita: Ene Jainkoa, Ene Jainkoa, zeren abandonatu nauk?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.
Basque: Eta Sabathoa iragan zenean, Maria Magdalenak eta Maria Jakesen amák eta Salomek eros zitzaten ungentu aromatikoak, ethorririk hura enbauma lezatenzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenik, elkharrekin jarririk zeudela hamekei ager zekién, eta reprotxa ziezen haien inkredulitatea, eta bihotz gogortasuna, zeren hura resuszitaturik ikhusi ukhan zutenak ezpaitzituzten sinhetsi.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenik, elkharrekin jarririk zeudela hamekei ager zekién, eta reprotxa ziezen haien inkredulitatea, eta bihotz gogortasuna, zeren hura resuszitaturik ikhusi ukhan zutenak ezpaitzituzten sinhetsi.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesus Kristen Ebanjelio Saindua S. Marken Araura
author: Leizarraga

English: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
Basque: Joanes zen desertuan, bathaiatzen hari zela eta predikatzen penitenziazko bathaioa bekhatuen barkhamenduarentzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also: for therefore came I forth.
Basque: Ihardetsi izan zaroen: «Goazen hurbilleko herrietarat eta hirietarat, hetan ere predika dezadan; hartakotz ethorria naiz ezen».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And saith unto him, See thou say nothing to any man: but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
Basque: ziotsola: «Begirautzu nihori erratetik. Baiñan zohaz eta erakuts diozazu zure burua aphezen prinzeari eta ofrenda zazu zure garbitzearentzat, Moisek exleitu izan duena lekhukotasuntzat balia dakientzat».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.
Basque: eta nola ezin hurbil baitzezaketen Jesusen aitziñerat jendetzearen fuertzaz, urratu zuten etxearen estalkia, eta idekidura handi bat eginik, erautsi izan zuten behererat paralitikoa zetzan ohea.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
Basque: «Zer darasa hunek? Blasfematzen du. Nork barkha ahal detzake bekhatuak Jainkoak berak baizen?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Why reason ye these things in your hearts?
Basque: Jesusek berehala ezaguturik bere Izpirituaz zer gogoeta zerabillaten bere barrenean, erran zaroen: «Zergatik darabiltzatzue gogoeta horiek zuen bihotzetan?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners, they said unto his disciples, How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners?
Basque: Eskribauek eta farisauek ikusirik publikano eta bekhatorosekien jaten zuela, erran zaroten haren dizipuluei: «Nondik heldu da, publikano eta bekhatorosekien jaten eta edaten baidu zuen nausiak?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast, but thy disciples fast not?
Basque: Joanesen eta farisauen dizipuluak, bada, barurtiarrak baitziren, ethorri zitzaizkon eta erran zioten: «Zergatik barurtzen dire Joanesen eta farisauen dizipuluak eta zureak ez dire egiten?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Behold, why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful?
Basque: Erran zioten bada Farisauek: «Ikusazu; horra nola egiten duten zure dizipuluek, sabato egunean egitea zilhegi ez dena».
remarks_sem: Translation mistake: Basque translator does not see that the sentence is a question, and gives a presentative sentence instead, in which the interrogativ NOLA 'how' looses its causal value.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Erran zaroen oraino: «Sabatoa gizonarentzat egiña izan da eta ez gizona sabatoarentzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Erran zaroen oraino: «Sabatoa gizonarentzat egiña izan da eta ez gizona sabatoarentzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
Basque: Bada Gizonaren Semea sabathoaren ere nausi da».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man,
Basque: Baiñan Jesusek alde guzietarat behatze hasarratu bat etxatzen zaroela, notatua baitzen hekien bihotzetako itsumenduaz, erran zioen gizon hari: «Heda zazu eskua». Hedatu zuen eta sendatu zitzaioen eskua.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
Basque: Ilkhirik bada berehala farisauak, jarri ziren batzar egiten haren kontra herodianoekien, nola galduko othe zuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
Basque: Eta erran zaroen bere dizipuluei iduk ziozotela han barku bat zerbitza ahal zekioena, jendetze hark leher ez zezan.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Berezi izan zituen hamabi harekien izateko eta predikatzerat igortzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Berezi izan zituen hamabi harekien izateko eta predikatzerat igortzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.
Basque: Hori aditurik, ethorri ziren haren ahaideak haren hartzerat, erraten zuten ezen zoratu zela.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.
Basque: Baldin erresuma bat partitzen bada bera beraren kontra, ezin iraun dezake erresuma hark.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.
Basque: Eta baldin etxe bat partitzen bada bera beraren kontra, ezin iraun dezake etxe hark.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.
Basque: Beraz baldin Satana altxatzen bada bera beraren kontra, partitua diteke, ezin iraunen du, baiñan akhabo da hartaz.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: No man can enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
Basque: Nihork ezin eraman detzake borthitz baten armak haren etxean sarthurik, non ez duen lehenik borthitza estekatzen, gero ondoan haren etxea arrobatzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: baiñan nork ere blasfematuko baidu Izpiritu Sainduaren kontra, eta hark ez du ardietsiko sekulan barkhamendurik; aitzitik hobenduri izanen da sekulan iraganen ez zaioen bekhatu batez».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: baiñan nork ere blasfematuko baidu Izpiritu Sainduaren kontra, eta hark ez du ardietsiko sekulan barkhamendurik; aitzitik hobenduri izanen da sekulan iraganen ez zaioen bekhatu batez».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Bertze parte bat berriz erori izan zen lur onerat eta eman zuen fruitu; burutu zen eta handitu, bihi batzuk ematen zutela batentzat hogoi eta hamar, bertzeek hirur hogoi eta bertzeek ehun».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables:
Basque: Eta erran zaroen: «Zuei eman izan zaitzue Jainkoaren Erresumako misterioen ezagutzea, baiñan kanpoan direnentzat hitz eztalitan dohaz guziak,
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word's sake, immediately they are offended.
Basque: ordean ez baidute errorik bere baitan, iraupen gutitako dire eta gero, heldu zaienean ezaldarterik eta atsekaberik, hitzaren ariaz berehala behaztopatzen dire.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And these are they which are sown on good ground; such as hear the word, and receive it, and bring forth fruit, some thirtyfold, some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Fiñean lur onerat hazia hartzen dutenak dire haiñak, zeiñek entzuten baidute hitza eta errezibitzen eta ekhartzen fruitua, batak hogoi eta hamar, bertzeak hirur hogoi eta bertzeak ehun batentzat».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta erran zaroen: «Zergatik zarete horren izikor? Nola ez duzue oraiño federik?». Eta hek, izialdura handi batek hartuak, ziotsoten batak bertzeari: «Nor othe da hau?, haizeak eta itsasoak obeditzen baidute».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta erran zaroen: «Zergatik zarete horren izikor? Nola ez duzue oraiño federik?». Eta hek, izialdura handi batek hartuak, ziotsoten batak bertzeari: «Nor othe da hau?, haizeak eta itsasoak obeditzen baidute».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.
Basque: oihu gora batekien erraten zioela: «Zer duzu zuk enekien, Jesus Jaungoikoaren Semea? Jainkoaz zaitut errekeritzen, ez nazazula tormenta».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing.
Basque: Eta beha zegoen inguruetarat ikusteko hori egin zuena.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But the woman fearing and trembling, knowing what was done in her, came and fell down before him, and told him all the truth.
Basque: Baiñan emaste hura iziturik eta ikharaturik, baitzakien zer iragan zen haren baithan, ethorri zen eta bere burua aurthikirik haren aitziñean, aithortu zioen zen guzia.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: While he yet spake, there came from the ruler of the synagogue's house certain which said, Thy daughter is dead: why troublest thou the Master any further?
Basque: Oraiño mintzo zela, ethorri ziren sinagogako buruzagia baitarik hari erraterat: «Zure alaba hill da; zergatik nekhatzen duzu gehiago nausia?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when he was come in, he saith unto them, Why make ye this ado, and weep? the damsel is not dead, but sleepeth.
Basque: Eta sarthu zenean, erran zaroen: «Zergatik altaratzen zarete, eta nigar egiten duzue? Neskatxa hau ez da hilla, baiñan lo datza».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder
