English: Is not this the carpenter, the son of Mary, the brother of James, and Joses, and of Juda, and Simon? and are not his sisters here with us? And they were offended at him.
Basque: Hau ez da harotz hura, Mariaren semea, Jakoberen, Josefen, Judasen eta Simonen anaia? Hunen arrebak ere ez dire hemen gure artean?». Eta eskandalisatuak ziren haren ariaz.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he marvelled because of their unbelief.
Basque: Hala miretsia zegoen hekien sinhets-gogortasunaz; hargatik bazebillan ingurutako herrisketan irakasten.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey, save a staff only; no scrip, no bread, no money in their purse:
Basque: Manatu zaroen ez zezatela deusik eraman bidekotz, bere makhilla baizen; ez zakhurik, ez ogirik, ez eta zarpan dirurik;
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta ez baitzaituzte errezibituko, ez aditu nahiko, handik ilkhitzean iharrosazue zuen oiñetako herrautsa, lekhukotasuntzat balia dadintzat hekien kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta ez baitzaituzte errezibituko, ez aditu nahiko, handik ilkhitzean iharrosazue zuen oiñetako herrautsa, lekhukotasuntzat balia dadintzat hekien kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And king Herod heard of him; (for his name was spread abroad:) and he said, That John the Baptist was risen from the dead, and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.
Basque: Aditu zuen, bada, errege Herodesek mintzatzen Jesusez, ezen haren izena jadan famatua zen, eta zioen: «Joanes Baptista bitztu diteke hilletarik; hargatik egiten dire hanbat mirakuillu haren eskuz».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Ezen Herodes hunek jendeak igorririk harrarazi izan zuen Joanes eta estekaturik emanarazi presondegian, Herodias bere anaia Filiperen emastea zela kausa, zeiña hartu baitzuen emastetzat;
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Ezen Herodes hunek jendeak igorririk harrarazi izan zuen Joanes eta estekaturik emanarazi presondegian, Herodias bere anaia Filiperen emastea zela kausa, zeiña hartu baitzuen emastetzat;
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him, and would have killed him; but she could not:
Basque: Horrengatik zitzaioen aiher Herodias eta nahi zukeen hillarazi; ordean ezin zagiken.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Tristatu zen hortaz errege, baiñan hala ere egin izan zuen juramentua gatik eta mahaiñean harekien zirenen gatik, ez zioen nahi izan egin damurik
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Tristatu zen hortaz errege, baiñan hala ere egin izan zuen juramentua gatik eta mahaiñean harekien zirenen gatik, ez zioen nahi izan egin damurik
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Tristatu zen hortaz errege, baiñan hala ere egin izan zuen juramentua gatik eta mahaiñean harekien zirenen gatik, ez zioen nahi izan egin damurik
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?
Basque: Ihardetsi izan zaroen hark eta erran: «Emozue zebonek jaterat». Hek berriz erran zioten: «Goanen othe gare erosterat berrehun kornaduren ogia, horiei jaterat emateko?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled, that is to say, with unwashen, hands, they found fault.
Basque: eta ikusirik haren dizipuluetarik zenbait esku lohiekien, erran nahi da garbitu gabeekien, jaten hari zirela, erasi zuten hekien kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Galdegiten zioten bada Farisauek eta eskribauek: «Zergatik ez dabiltza zure dizipuluak aitzinekoen emankarien arauera, baiñan esku lohiekien dute jaten?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Galdegiten zioten bada Farisauek eta eskribauek: «Zergatik ez dabiltza zure dizipuluak aitzinekoen emankarien arauera, baiñan esku lohiekien dute jaten?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.
Basque: Erraten zaroen halaber: «Bide dakizue Jainkoaren manamenduen ezeztatzen zuen tradizioneari atxikitzeko,
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Basque: Zuek diozue aitzitik: Gizon batek erraten badio bere aitari edo amari: Ene ganik diteken korbona, erranahi da ofrenda, zuri ere balia dakizula, konplitzen du legea.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother;
Basque: Eta ez duzue uzten deus ere gehiagokorik egin dezan bere aitarentzat edo amarentzat,
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother;
Basque: Eta ez duzue uzten deus ere gehiagokorik egin dezan bere aitarentzat edo amarentzat,
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition, which ye have delivered: and many such like things do ye.
Basque: ezeztatzen duzuela manera hortan Jainkoaren manamendua zebonek asmatu duzuen tradizione batez; eta horlako bertze hainitz gauza ere egiten ditutzue».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto her, For this saying go thy way; the devil is gone out of thy daughter.
Basque: Orduan erran izan zioen: «Hitz horrengatik, bada, zohaz; ilkhi da deabrua zure alaba ganik».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he sighed deeply in his spirit, and saith, Why doth this generation seek after a sign? verily I say unto you, There shall no sign be given unto this generation.
Basque: Baiñan Jesusek bihotzaren barnetik hatsbeherapen bat eginik erran izan zuen: «Zergatik dagot nazione hau seinale galdez? Erraten darotzuet egia, ez zaioela emanen jenderazione huni seiñalerik».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Eta hori ezaguturik Jesusek, erran izan zaroen: «Zergatik darasazue zuen gogoan ogirik ez duzuela? Oraino ez duzue ezagutzarik, ez adimendurik? Oraiño gogorkitua duzue zuen bihotza?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Eta hori ezaguturik Jesusek, erran izan zaroen: «Zergatik darasazue zuen gogoan ogirik ez duzuela? Oraino ez duzue ezagutzarik, ez adimendurik? Oraiño gogorkitua duzue zuen bihotza?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.
Basque: Bortz ogi hautsi izan nituenean bortz milla gizonentzat, zenbat saski altxatu zinituzten zathiz betheak? «Erran zioten hek: «Hamabi».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.
Basque: Eta zazpi ogi hautsi izan nituenean laur milla gizonentzat, zenbat otharre altxatu zinituzten, puskaz betheak? «Zazpi», diotsate hek.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Nork ere ezen nahiko baidu bere burua salbatu, galduko du; eta nork ere galduko baidu bere burua ene gatik eta Ebanjelioa gatik, salbatuko du.
allomorph: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evangile
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Nork ere ezen nahiko baidu bere burua salbatu, galduko du; eta nork ere galduko baidu bere burua ene gatik eta Ebanjelioa gatik, salbatuko du.
allomorph: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evangile
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
Basque: Eta zer probetxu luke gizonak, irabaz baleza ere mundu guzia, baldin galtzen balu bere burua?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen nihor ahalkatzen bada nitaz eta ene hitzaz arraza adultera eta bekhatoros hunen artean, Gizonaren Semea ere ahalke izanen da hartaz, noiz eta ere ethorriko baida bere Aitaren glorian bere aingeru sainduekien».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen nihor ahalkatzen bada nitaz eta ene hitzaz arraza adultera eta bekhatoros hunen artean, Gizonaren Semea ere ahalke izanen da hartaz, noiz eta ere ethorriko baida bere Aitaren glorian bere aingeru sainduekien».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen nihor ahalkatzen bada nitaz eta ene hitzaz arraza adultera eta bekhatoros hunen artean, Gizonaren Semea ere ahalke izanen da hartaz, noiz eta ere ethorriko baida bere Aitaren glorian bere aingeru sainduekien».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Orduan Piarresek hitza harturik, erran zioen Jesusi: «Nausia, ungi gare hemen; egitzigun hemen hirur etxola, bata zuretzat, bertzea Moiserentzat eta bertzea Eliasentzat».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Orduan Piarresek hitza harturik, erran zioen Jesusi: «Nausia, ungi gare hemen; egitzigun hemen hirur etxola, bata zuretzat, bertzea Moiserentzat eta bertzea Eliasentzat».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Orduan Piarresek hitza harturik, erran zioen Jesusi: «Nausia, ungi gare hemen; egitzigun hemen hirur etxola, bata zuretzat, bertzea Moiserentzat eta bertzea Eliasentzat».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And they asked him, saying, Why say the scribes that Elias must first come?
Basque: Gero galdegin zioten eta erran: «Zer erraten dute, bada, Farisauek eta eskribauek, Elias ethorri beharra dela lehenago?»
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
Basque: Ihardetsi izan zaroen Jesusek: «Egia da, Elias ethorriko da lehenago eta gauza guziak bere estaturako ditu eta Gizonaren Semeaz eskribatua izan den bezala, hark ere sofrituko du hainitz; gaitzetsia eta mesprezatua izanen da.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
Basque: Jesus sarthu zenean etxean, bere dizipuluek galdegin zioten apartean: «Zergatik ezin guk kasatu dukegu deabru hura?»
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name, receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me, receiveth not me, but him that sent me.
Basque: Nork ere errezibituko baidu hunelako haurtxoetarik bat ene izenean, ni errezibitzen nauke; eta nork ere ni errezibitzen bainau, eta hark ez nau ni xoilki errezibitzen, baiñan bai ni igorri izan nauena».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And if thy hand offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed, than having two hands to go into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:
Basque: Baldin zure eskuak trebekaratzitzen bazaitu, ebaki zazu; hobe da zuretzat sartzea bizitzean esku bakhoitzdun, ezen ez bi esku ditutzula goatea ifernurat, behinere iraungituko ez den surat;
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the Pharisees came to him, and asked him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife? tempting him.
Basque: Eta Farisauak ere harat ethorririk, galdez zegozkon hura tentatzea gatik, hea zilhegi zaioen gizonari bere emastea uztea.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.
Basque: Jesusek ihardetsi zaroen eta erran: «Zuen bihotzeko gogortasuna gatik eman darotzue ordenamendu hori.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;
Basque: Horren gatik du utziko gizonak bere aita eta bere ama, eta da egonen bere emastearekien.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
Basque: eta erran zaroen: «Nork ere utzten baidu bere emastea eta bertze bat esposatzen, adulterioa egiten du haren kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
Basque: Jesusek ihardetsi zioen: «Zergatik deithzen nauzu ona? Ez da nihor onik, Jainkoa bera baizen.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
Basque: Orduan Piarres hasi zitzaioen erraten: «Huna guk utzi izan ditugu guziak eta jarraiki gaitzkitzu zuri».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Jesusek ihardetsi zioen: «Erraten darotzuet egia: Nihor ez da utzi dukenik etxea edo bere anaia edo bere arrebak edo bere aita edo bere ama edo bere haurrak edo bere lurrak ene gatik eta Ebanjelioa gatik,
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Jesusek ihardetsi zioen: «Erraten darotzuet egia: Nihor ez da utzi dukenik etxea edo bere anaia edo bere arrebak edo bere aita edo bere ama edo bere haurrak edo bere lurrak ene gatik eta Ebanjelioa gatik,
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And James and John, the sons of Zebedee, come unto him, saying, Master, we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire.
Basque: Orduan ethorri zitzaizkon Jakobe eta Joanes Zebedearen semeak eta erran zioten: «Nausia, nahi ginduke guk, galdetu gogo darotzuguna egin ziñezagun».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?
Basque: Ihardetsi zaroen: «Zer nahi duzue egin diezazuedan?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
Basque: Baina ene eskuinean edo ene ezkerrean jartea, ezta ene emaiteko, baina emanen zaie preparatu izan zaienei.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Ezen Gizonaren Semea ere ez da ethorri izan zerbitzatua izaterat, aitzitik bai zerbitzatzerat eta bere bizia ematerat hainitzen erresketamenduarentzat».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

author: Haraneder

English: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou son of David, have mercy on me.
Basque: Eta mehatxuz zegozkon hainitz, zegoela ixillik; bainan hark oihua hagitz zaraman gorago: «Dabiden Semea, nauzun urrikari».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.
Basque: Jesusek hitza harturik, erran izan zioen: «Zer nahi duzu egin diezazudan?». Itsuak ihardetsi zioen: «Nausia, egizu ikus dezadan».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Basque: Eta hari zitzaien irakasten, erraten zaroelarik: «Eskribatua ez da ene etxea othoitzeko etxea izanen dela deithua nazione guzietan? Bizkitartean zuek egin duzue hura ohoiñen gordelekhu bat».
remarks_sem: versions differ. Perhaps here English preposition OF expresses the agent?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
Basque: Hargatik darotzuet erraten: Zer ere othoitzez galdetuko baiduzue, sinhetsazue ardietsiko duzuela, eta hala helduko zaizkitzue ere.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
Basque: Ordean othoitzean jartzen zaretenean, baldin deusik nihoren kontra baduzue, barkha diozozue, zuen Aita zeruetan denak ere zuei barkha dietzatzuentzat zuen bekhatuak.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?
Basque: Eta erran zioten: «Zer authoritatez egiten ditutzu gauza horiek eta nork eman darotzu bothere horien egiteko?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
Basque: Baiñan hek elkharren artean arrozoinatzen zuten ziotelarik: «Baldin erraten badugu zerutikan zela, erranen daroku: zergatik, beraz, ez duzue hura sinhetsi:
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Erraten badugu berriz gizonetarik zela, beldur izateko gare populuarentzat». Ezen guziek zadukaten Joanes egiazki zela profeta.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Erraten badugu berriz gizonetarik zela, beldur izateko gare populuarentzat». Ezen guziek zadukaten Joanes egiazki zela profeta.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
Basque: Sasoiña ethorri zenean, igorri zaroen mahastizainei bere zerbitzari bat, hekien ganik errezibitzeko mahastiko fruituetarik zor ziotena.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.
Basque: Fiñean seme bakhoitz eta maite bat izan eta hura ere igorri izan zaroen azkenekotz, erraten zuelarik ezen: Agian ene semearentzat izanen dute zerbait ikustate.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Aiher ziren bada haren gelditzerat, baiñan beldur populuarentzat, ezagutu zuten ezen hetaz minzo zela parabola hortan; eta hura han utzirik, goan ziren handik.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Aiher ziren bada haren gelditzerat, baiñan beldur populuarentzat, ezagutu zuten ezen hetaz minzo zela parabola hortan; eta hura han utzirik, goan ziren handik.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Aiher ziren bada haren gelditzerat, baiñan beldur populuarentzat, ezagutu zuten ezen hetaz minzo zela parabola hortan; eta hura han utzirik, goan ziren handik.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, to catch him in his words.
Basque: Gero igorri izan ziotzaten farisauetarik eta herodiarretarik zenbait, hura bere hitzetan atzeman nahiz.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when they were come, they say unto him, Master, we know that thou art true, and carest for no man: for thou regardest not the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth: Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar, or not?
Basque: Eta hek ethorririk, erran izan zioten: «Nausia, badakigu egiatia zarela eta nihoren antsiarik ez duzula, ezen ez diozu behatzen gizonaren iduriari, baiñan egiazki irakasten duzu Jainkoaren bidea. Zilhegi da tributua pagatzea Kaesari?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Eta hark ezaguturik hekien hipokrisia erran zaroen: «Zergatik tentatzen nauzue? Ekhar diezadazue denario bat ikus dezadan».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Eta hark ezaguturik hekien hipokrisia erran zaroen: «Zergatik tentatzen nauzue? Ekhar diezadazue denario bat ikus dezadan».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: «Nausia, Moisek eskribuz utzi izan daroku: Baldin norbeiten anaia hiltzen bada eta uzten badu emastea haurrik gabe, har dezala haren anaiak haren emastea, bere anaia zenari leinu egiteko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: «Nausia, Moisek eskribuz utzi izan daroku: Baldin norbeiten anaia hiltzen bada eta uzten badu emastea haurrik gabe, har dezala haren anaiak haren emastea, bere anaia zenari leinu egiteko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
Basque: Ondoan Jesusek erraten zaroen tenpluan irakasten hari zela: «Nola erraten dute eskribauek Kristo Dabiden semea dela?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Basque: zeiñek iresten baidituzte alhargunen etxeak, orazione luzeak egiten dituztelako atzekian. Halakoek kondenazione garratzago bat izanen dukete».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Altxatuko da ezen populua populuaren kontra eta erresuma erresumaren kontra, eta izanen dire lur ikharatzeak lekhu haiñitzetan eta goseteak. Horiek ditezke doloreen hastapenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Altxatuko da ezen populua populuaren kontra eta erresuma erresumaren kontra, eta izanen dire lur ikharatzeak lekhu haiñitzetan eta goseteak. Horiek ditezke doloreen hastapenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Altxatuko da ezen populua populuaren kontra eta erresuma erresumaren kontra, eta izanen dire lur ikharatzeak lekhu haiñitzetan eta goseteak. Horiek ditezke doloreen hastapenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Ordean zuek goardia emozue zuen buruei; eramanen zaituzte ezen juieen batzarretarat, azotaraziko zaituzte sinagogetan, eta presentatu beharko duzue ene ariaz gobernadoreen eta erregeen aitziñean han nitaz lekhukotasun bihurtzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Ordean zuek goardia emozue zuen buruei; eramanen zaituzte ezen juieen batzarretarat, azotaraziko zaituzte sinagogetan, eta presentatu beharko duzue ene ariaz gobernadoreen eta erregeen aitziñean han nitaz lekhukotasun bihurtzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
Basque: Ordean lehenago behar du izan Ebanjelioak predikatua nazione guziei.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
Basque: Orduan libratuko du anaiak anaia heriotzerat eta aitak semea; altxatuko ere dire umeak burasoen kontra eta hillaraziko dituzte.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
Basque: Eta gaitxetsiak izanen zarete mundu guziaz ene izena gatik; baiñan azkeneraiño iraunen duena izanen da salbatua.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
Basque: etxe gaiñean ditekena ez bedi jauts etxerat, ez barnerat sar, zerbait eramateko guraz.
remarks_morph: reinforced by the postposition XEDEZ 'with purpose'.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
Basque: Eta landan ditekena ez bedi bihur gibelat bere tresnen hartzerat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
Basque: Ezen izanen dire egun hek halako tribulazionezkoak, non Jainkoak lehenbizi kreaturak egin zituenetik hunat ez baida izan halakorik, ez izanen ere sekulan.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
Basque: Eta baldin Jaunak laburtu ez balitu egun hek, nihor ez liteke salbatuko ere; baiñan hautatu izan dituen bereziengatik gutitu ditu egun hek.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
Basque: Altxatuko dire ezen Kristo falso batzu eta profeta falso batzu, zeiñek egiñen ere baidituzte mirakuilluak eta gauza espantagarriak, enganatzea gatik posible balitz hautatuak berak ere.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
Basque: Zaudete beraz atzarriak, ez dakizue ezen noiz ethorriko diteken etxeko jauna, arratsean ala gauerditan ala oillarritean ala goizean;
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
Basque: Zen, bada, Bazko eta ogi lebami gabekoen besta bi egunen buruan; eta aphezen prinzeak eta eskribauak zebiltzan bilha, nola Jesus fiñeziaz atzemanen zuten eta hillaraziko zuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
Basque: Ziren, bada, zenbait hori bere baithan gaitxetsi zutenak eta ziotenak: «Zertako galdu behar zen ungentu hori horla?
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
Basque: Sal ahal ziteken ezen ungentu hori hirur ehun denario baiño gehiagotan eta eman pobreei». Eta bazarasaten emaste haren kontra.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Baiñan Jesusek erran zaroen: «Utzazue gaxoa; zergatik, damu egiten diozue? Obra on bat egin du ene alderat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Baiñan Jesusek erran zaroen: «Utzazue gaxoa; zergatik, damu egiten diozue? Obra on bat egin du ene alderat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
Basque: Bethiere ezen pobreak zuekien dituzketzue eta nahi duzuenean hei ungi egin ahal diozokezue; ordean ni ez nauzue bethi izanen.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.
Basque: Ahal duena hunek egin du; gantzutu du aitziñerat ene gorphutza ehortz orduko.
remarks_morph: Reinforced by the postposition ORDUKO 'for the moment'.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
Basque: Orduan Judas Iskariotez hamabietarik bat goan zen aphezen prinzeetarat Jesus hei libratzeko xedez.
remarks_morph: Reinforced by the postposition XEDEZ 'with purpose'.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
Basque: Lebami gabeko ogien lehenbiziko egunean, bada, zeinetan Bazkoko bildotsa sakrifikatzen baitzuten, erran izan zioten bere dizipuluek: «Norat nahi duzu goazen eta prepara diezazugun Bazkoa jateko behar dena?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
Basque: Eta erran zaroen: «Hau ene odola da, testament berrikoa, zeiña isuriko baida haiñitzentzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.
Basque: «Ene Aita, ene Aita», ziotsan; «gauza guziak posible dire zuretzat; aldara zazu kalix hau ene ganik; halarik ere, bada, egin bedi zure borondatea eta ez enea».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
Basque: Zaudete atzarriak eta egizue othoitz, sar ez zaitezten tentazionean; izpiritua agudo da, ordean haragia flako».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Jesusek hitza harturik, erran zaroen: «Ohoin baten ondoan bezala heldu zarete ene ganat, ezpatekien eta makhillekien ene hartzerat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Jesusek hitza harturik, erran zaroen: «Ohoin baten ondoan bezala heldu zarete ene ganat, ezpatekien eta makhillekien ene hartzerat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Bizkitartean aphezen prinzeak eta batzar guzia lekhukotasun bilha zebiltzan Jesusen kontra hura hillarazitzeko, eta ez zuten aurkhitzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Bizkitartean aphezen prinzeak eta batzar guzia lekhukotasun bilha zebiltzan Jesusen kontra hura hillarazitzeko, eta ez zuten aurkhitzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
Basque: Hainitzek ezen lekhukotasun falsoak bihurtzen zituzten haren kontra; ordean hekien lekhukotasunak ez ziren akort batzuek bertzenekien.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
Basque: Batzuk bada altxaturik, ekharri zuten lekhukotasun falso bat haren kontra, erraten zutelarik:
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
Basque: Orduan aphez handiak guzien arterat jaikirik, galdegin zioen Jesusi erraten zioelarik: «Ez duzu deusik ihardesten hauk zure kontra ekhartzen dituzten testimonioen gaiñean?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.
Basque: Bizkitartean hainitz gauzez akusatzen zuten aphezen prinzeek.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
Basque: Pilatusek, bada, berriz ere galdegin zioen eta erran: «Ez duzu deus ihardesten? Ikusazu zenbat gauzez akusatzen zaituzten».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.
Basque: Bazakien ezen inbidiaz eman zutela aphezen prinzeek haren eskuetan.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
Basque: Pilatusek, bada, populuaren gogara egin nahiz, largatu zaroen Barrabas; eta Jesus azotaturik eman zaroen eskuetarat gurutzefikatzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
Basque: Horla trufatu ondoan hartaz, khendu zioten eskarlatazko kapa hura eta bestiturik bere soiñekoz, eraman zuten gurutzefikatzerat.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.
Basque: Eta gurutzefikatu izan zutenean, partitu zituzten haren bestimendak, zortherat etxaturik nork zer eramanen zuen.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
Basque: Eta bederatzi garren orenean Jesusek egin zuen oihu handi bat, erraten zuelarik: «Eloi, eloi, lama sabahtani»; zeiñak erran nahi baidu: «Ene Jainkoa, ene Jainkoa, zergatik abandonatu nauzu?».
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.
Basque: Sabato eguna iragan zenean, Maria Magdalenak eta Maria Jakoberen amak, eta Salomek, erosi izan zituzten aromatak Jesus hetaz gantzutzerat ethortzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenean agertu zitzaien hamekei mahaiñean zeudezela; eta erreportxu egin zaroen bere sinhets gaitztasunaz eta bihotzeko gogortasunaz, zeren ez baitzituzten sinhetsi hura biztu zela ikusi izan zutenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenean agertu zitzaien hamekei mahaiñean zeudezela; eta erreportxu egin zaroen bere sinhets gaitztasunaz eta bihotzeko gogortasunaz, zeren ez baitzituzten sinhetsi hura biztu zela ikusi izan zutenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - J. Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua San Mark-en arauera
author: Haraneder

English: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
Basque: Joanes mortuan egotu da bathaiatuz eta urrikizko bathaioa erantzunez <bekhatuen barkhamendutan>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also: for therefore came I forth.
Basque: Eta ihardetsi zaroeten: Goazen hurbileko herri eta hirietara, han predika dezadan; ezen <hortara> naiz ethorria.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And saith unto him, See thou say nothing to any man: but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
Basque: Eta erran zioen: Berautzu nihori erran; bainan zoaz, ager zaite aphezen buruzagiari; eta <zure xahupenaren arietan> eskaint zatzu Moisesek manatu dituenak, lekhukotasunetan detzazten izan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.
Basque: Eta nola aitzinera ezin eman baitziozoketen <jende murruaren ariaz>, agertu zuten hura zagoen etxeko hegaztegia; eta zilho bat eginik, beheiti jautsi zuten ohea, zeintan baizatzan enblaia.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
Basque: Hau <nolaz> da horrela mintzo? burho egiten du. Nor da bekhatuak barkha detzazkeenik, baizik-ere Jainkoa bakharrik?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Why reason ye these things in your hearts?
Basque: Jesusek ordu berean bere izpirituaz ezaguturik nolako gogoetak zerabiltzaten beren baithan, erraten diote: <Zergatik> alhatzen ditutzue gogoeta horiek zuen bihotzetan?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners, they said unto his disciples, How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners?
Basque: Eta Iskribauek eta Farisauek ikhustenez zergazale eta bekhatoreekin jaten zuela, erraten zioten haren dizipuluei: Zuen nausiak <zertako> jaten eta edaten du zergazale eta bekhatoreen baltsan?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast, but thy disciples fast not?
Basque: Bada, Joanesen dizipuluak eta Farisauak barur egileak ziren; eta badathortzi, eta Jesusi erraten diote: <Zergatik> barurtzen dire Joanesen dizipuluak eta Farisauenak, eta zure dizipuluek ez dute barur egiten?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Behold, why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful?
Basque: Bada, Farisauek erraten zioten Jesusi: Horra, <zertako> egiten dute zilhegi ez dena?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran zioten: Larunbata <gizona gatik> da egina, eta ez gizona larunbata gatik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran zioten: Larunbata gizona gatik da egina, eta ez gizona <larunbata gatik>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
Basque: Bada Gizonaren Semea sabathoaren ere nausi da».
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man,
Basque: Eta hekiei inguruan hasarrerekin begiratuz; <hekien bihotzeko itsutasunaz> atsekabetan, gizonari erraten dio: Heda zazu eskua. Eta hedatu zuen, eta ontsatu zitzaioen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
Basque: Bada, handik ilkhirik, Farisauek berehala Herodestarrekin batzarre egin zuten haren kontra, hean nola galaraz othe zezaketen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
Basque: Eta bere dizipuluei erran zioten, iduk ziozoten untzixka bat, hartaz baliatzeko <ostearen ariaz>, lehertua ez izateko.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
Basque: Eta bere dizipuluei erran zioten, iduk ziozoten untzixka bat, hartaz baliatzeko ostearen ariaz, <lehertua ez izateko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Eta hamabi egin zituen <berekilako>, eta predikatzera igortzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Eta hamabi egin zituen berekilako, eta <predikatzera igortzeko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.
Basque: Eta Jesusen ahaideek aditu zutenean, ethorri ziren <haren hartzera>, ezik zioten, burutik jauzia zela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.
Basque: Eta baldin debrua <bere buruaren kontra> jauzten bada, bi aldetara dago, ez dirauke eta akhabatzera dihoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: No man can enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
Basque: Nihork ez diotzozke gizon hazkarrari, etxean sarthurik, dituenak eraman, non ez duen lehenik estekatzen bera, eta orduan biluziren dio etxea.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: Bainan <Izpiritu sainduaren kontra> burho arthikitzen duenak ez du nihoiz-ere barkhamendurik izanen; bainan hobendun izanen da bethirainoko hobenaz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: Bainan Izpiritu sainduaren kontra burho arthikitzen duenak ez du nihoiz-ere barkhamendurik izanen; bainan hobendun izanen da bethirainoko hobenaz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta bertze bat erori zen lur onera, eta ekharri zuen burua, zeina goratu eta larritu baitzen, eta erran zuen, zeinak hogoi eta hamar bihi, zeinak hirur hogoi, eta zeinak ehun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables:
Basque: Eta ihardetsi zioten: Zuei mana izan zaitzue ezagutzea Jainkoaren erresumaren misterioa; bainan <kanpokoentzat>, hitz estalitan dihoaz oro;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word's sake, immediately they are offended.
Basque: Bainan beren baithan ez dute erroaren lekhurik, ordutiar dire; gero hitzaren ariaz hestura eta jazarpen zerbait ethorri deneko, behaztopatzen dire.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And these are they which are sown on good ground; such as hear the word, and receive it, and bring forth fruit, some thirtyfold, some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta hainak dire lur onean erain zaiotenak, zeinek aditzen baitute hitza, eta onhesten, eta fruitu ekhartzen, batak hogoi eta hamar, bertzeak hirur hogoi, eta bertzeak ehun.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta erran zioten Jesusek: <Zeren> zarete beldurti? Ez duzue bada sinhesterik oraino? Eta laztura gaitzaz hartuak ziren, eta zioten elkharri: Nor othe da hau, haizeak eta itsasoak entzuten baitute?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta erran zioten Jesusek: Zeren zarete beldurti? Ez duzue bada sinhesterik oraino? Eta laztura gaitzaz hartuak ziren, eta zioten elkharri: Nor othe da hau, haizeak eta itsasoak entzuten baitute?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.
Basque: Eta heiagoraka erran zuen: Zer da zure eta ene artean, Jesus, Jainko guziz goraren Semea? <Jainkoaren izenaz> errekeitzen zaitut, ez nezazun oinhazta.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing.
Basque: Eta inguruka begira zagoen, <hori egin zuenaren ikhusteko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But the woman fearing and trembling, knowing what was done in her, came and fell down before him, and told him all the truth.
Basque: Orduan emaztekia, beldurrez eta ikharan, baitzakien zer gerthatu zitzaioen bere baithan, ethorri eta Jesusen oinetara erori zen, eta aithortu zioen egia guzia.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: While he yet spake, there came from the ruler of the synagogue's house certain which said, Thy daughter is dead: why troublest thou the Master any further?
Basque: Oraino mintzo zelarik, sinagoga buruzagiari ethorri zitzaizkon erratera: Hil da, zure alaba; <zertako> akhiaraz gehiago Nausia?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when he was come in, he saith unto them, Why make ye this ado, and weep? the damsel is not dead, but sleepeth.
Basque: Eta sarthurik erraten diote: Zer ditutzue asaldu eta marraska horiek? nexka ez da hila, bainan lo dago.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Is not this the carpenter, the son of Mary, the brother of James, and Joses, and of Juda, and Simon? and are not his sisters here with us? And they were offended at him.
Basque: Hau ez othe da dakigun zurgina, Mariaren semea, Jakoberen, Josepen, Judaren eta Simonen anaia? horren arrebak ere ez othe dire guthartean? Eta gaizkira behaztopatzen ziren <haren ariaz>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he marvelled because of their unbelief.
Basque: Eta <hekien sinhesgogortasunaz> harritzen zen, eta bazabilan inguruetako herrietan irakhatsiz.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey, save a staff only; no scrip, no bread, no money in their purse:
Basque: Eta manatu zioten deusere <bidekotzat> makhila baizik etzezaten eraman, ez murtxila, ez ogi, ez-eta dirurik gerrikoan;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta edozeinek etzezazten ez onhets, ez entzun, handik goatean iharrosazue zuen oinetako herrautsa, <hekien kontrako lekhukotasunetan>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta edozeinek etzezazten ez onhets, ez entzun, handik goatean iharrosazue zuen oinetako herrautsa, <hekien kontrako> lekhukotasunetan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And king Herod heard of him; (for his name was spread abroad:) and he said, That John the Baptist was risen from the dead, and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.
Basque: Bada, Herodes erregeak nabaritu zuen Jesusez (ezik lelotan zen haren izena), eta erraten zuen: Hiletarik biztu da Joanes Baptista, eta <hargatik> egiten dire haren eskuz sendagailak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Ezen Herodesek berak igorri izan zuen Joanesen hartzera eta iduki zuen preso burdinetan, Herodias, <bere anaia Filiperen emaztea gatik>, zeina berak hartu baitzuen andretzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Ezen Herodesek berak igorri izan zuen Joanesen hartzera eta iduki zuen preso burdinetan, Herodias, bere anaia Filiperen emaztea gatik, zeina berak hartu baitzuen <andretzat>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him, and would have killed him; but she could not:
Basque: Herodias <horren gatik>, Joanes galdu beharrez zabilan, eta hilarazi nahi zuen, bainan etzezazten;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Erregek atsekabe hartu zuen; bainan zin egin zuelakoz, eta batean bere bestaliarren ariaz, damurik etzioen egin nahi izan;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Erregek atsekabe hartu zuen; bainan zin egin zuelakoz, eta batean <bere bestaliarren ariaz>, damurik etzioen egin nahi izan;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?
Basque: Eta ihardestean, Jesusek erran zioten: Zuek emozuete jatera. Hekiek erran zioten: Goazen, eros dezagun berrehun denarioren ogia, eta emanen daroegu jatera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Eta Farisau eta Iskribauek galdatzen zioten Jesusi: Zure dizipuluak <nolaz> ez dabiltza aitzinekoen irakhaspenaren arabera, aitzitik arronteko eskuekin jaten dute ogia?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Eta Farisau eta Iskribauek galdatzen zioten Jesusi: Zure dizipuluak nolaz ez dabiltza aitzinekoen irakhaspenaren arabera, aitzitik arronteko eskuekin jaten dute ogia?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.
Basque: Eta erraten zioten: Bai ederki alfer eragiten duzue Jainkoaren manamendua, <zuen ohitzaren begiratzeko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Basque: Zuek derrazue aldiz: Aski da gizon batek aitari edo amari erraten badio: Nik Jainkoari egin Corbana (erran nahi da emaitza), baliaturen zaitzu.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother;
Basque: Eta ez duzue gehiago uzten deusen egitera <bere aitaren edo amarentzat>,
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition, which ye have delivered: and many such like things do ye.
Basque: Horreletan ezeztatuz Jainkoaren hitza, zeronek ezarri duzuen <aztura baten bidez>; eta bertze horrelako asko duzue egiten.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto her, For this saying go thy way; the devil is gone out of thy daughter.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran zioen: Zoaz, debrua <hitz horren ariaz> ilkhi da zure alabaren ganik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the Pharisees came forth, and began to question with him, seeking of him a sign from heaven, tempting him.
Basque: Eta Farisauak atheratu zitzaizkon eta ihardukitzen abiatu, galdatuz, <haren frogotzea gatik>, zerutikako zerbait ezagutkari.

English: And he sighed deeply in his spirit, and saith, Why doth this generation seek after a sign? verily I say unto you, There shall no sign be given unto this generation.
Basque: Jesusek barnetik hasbeherapen bat atheratuz, erran zuen: Gizalde hau <zergatik> dago ezagutkari galdez? Egiaz derratzuet, ala ematen bazaio gizalde huni ezagutkaririk.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Hori ezaguturik, Jesusek erran zioten: Zer ditutzue gogoeta horiek, ogirik ez duzuela? zer, ez duzue oraino ez ezagutzarik ez adigarririk? itsu duzue oraino bihotza?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Hori ezaguturik, Jesusek erran zioten: Zer ditutzue gogoeta horiek, ogirik ez duzuela? zer, ez duzue oraino ez ezagutzarik ez adigarririk? itsu duzue oraino bihotza?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.
Basque: Bortz ogi hautsi naroztenean <bortz mila gizoni>, zenbat saski puskaz betheak goititu zintuzten? Eta diote: Hamabi.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.
Basque: Eta zazpi ogi hautsi diozkatenean <lau mila gizoni>, pusketarik zenbat saski altxatu ditutzue? Zazpi, diote.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Ezen bere burua begiratu nahiko duenak, galduko du; aldiz bere buruaz arnegatuko duenak <ni gatik> eta Ebanjelioa gatik, salbatuko eginen du.
allomorph: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evangile
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Ezen bere burua begiratu nahiko duenak, galduko du; aldiz bere buruaz arnegatuko duenak ni gatik eta <Ebanjelioa gatik>, salbatuko eginen du.
allomorph: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evangile
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
Basque: Alabainan gizonari zer ekhar liozoke mundu guziaren irabazteak, bere arimaren galtzerat heldu balitz?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen jendaki lizun eta gaixto hunen erdian, norbaitek <nitaz> eta ene hitzez ahalke hartzen badu, gizonaren Semeak ere hainaz ahalke izanen du, bere Aitaren ospean bere aingeru sainduekin ethorriren denean.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen jendaki lizun eta gaixto hunen erdian, norbaitek nitaz eta <ene hitzez> ahalke hartzen badu, gizonaren Semeak ere hainaz ahalke izanen du, bere Aitaren ospean bere aingeru sainduekin ethorriren denean.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Ezen jendaki lizun eta gaixto hunen erdian, norbaitek nitaz eta ene hitzez ahalke hartzen badu, gizonaren Semeak ere <hainaz> ahalke izanen du, bere Aitaren ospean bere aingeru sainduekin ethorriren denean.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Eta hitza hartuz, Piarresek erraten dio Jesusi: Nausia, ongi gare hemen; detzagun egin hirur etxola, bat <zure>, bertzea Moisesen, bertzea berriz Eliasen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Eta hitza hartuz, Piarresek erraten dio Jesusi: Nausia, ongi gare hemen; detzagun egin hirur etxola, bat zure, bertzea <Moisesen>, bertzea berriz Eliasen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Eta hitza hartuz, Piarresek erraten dio Jesusi: Nausia, ongi gare hemen; detzagun egin hirur etxola, bat zure, bertzea Moisesen, bertzea berriz <Eliasen>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And they asked him, saying, Why say the scribes that Elias must first come?
Basque: Eta Jesusi galdeka hari zitzaizkon erranez: Zer diote bada Farisauek eta Iskribauek, ezen Elias lehenik ethorri behar dela?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
Basque: Ihardestean, Jesusek erran zioten: Eliasek, lehenik ethorri ondoan, ontsaturen ditu gauza guziak; eta jasanen du hainitz eta arbuiatua izanen da, gizonaren Semeaz iskribatua izan den bezala.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
Basque: Eta Jesus etxera sarthu zenean, bere dizipuluek ixilean galdatzen zioten: <Zergatik> guk ezin khendu dugu debru hori?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name, receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me, receiveth not me, but him that sent me.
Basque: Nork-ere hunelako haurttoetarik bat hartzen baitu <ene izenean>, ni hartzen nau; eta nork-ere hartzen bainau, ez nau ni hartzen, bainan bai ni bidali nauena.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.
Basque: Hekiei ihardestean, Jesusek erran zuen: <Zuen bihotz gogortasunaren ariaz> iskribatu du zuentzat manamendu hori.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;
Basque: <Hargatik> gizonak utziko ditu bere ait-amak, eta bere emazteari eratxikiren da;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran zioten: Norkere utzi baituke bere emaztea, eta bertze bat hartu, lohikeria darama <lehenbizikoaren eretzera>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
Basque: Bada, Jesusek ihardetsi zioen: <Zergatik> deitzen nauzu ona? Onik ez da nihor, Jainkoa bera baizik.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
Basque: Eta Piarres abiatu zitzaion erraten: Huna guk oro utzi eta zuri jarraiki garela.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Jesusek ihardestean erran zuen: Egiaz derratzuet nik: Ez da nihor utziko dituenik bere etxea, edo anaiak, edo arrebak, edo aita, edo ama, edo haurrak, edo lurrak, <ene gatik> eta ebanjelioaren gatik,
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Jesusek ihardestean erran zuen: Egiaz derratzuet nik: Ez da nihor utziko dituenik bere etxea, edo anaiak, edo arrebak, edo aita, edo ama, edo haurrak, edo lurrak, ene gatik eta <ebanjelioaren gatik>,
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And James and John, the sons of Zebedee, come unto him, saying, Master, we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire.
Basque: Eta haren gana hurbildu ziren Jakobe eta Joanes, Zebedeoren semeak, ziotelarik: Nausia, nahi ginduke egin bazinezagu guk galdaturen duguna.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?
Basque: Jesusek berriz, ihardets zioten: Zer nahi duzue egin dezazuedan?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
Basque: Bainan ene eskuinean edo ezkerrean jartzea, ez dago niri ematea; bainan toki hekiek <hainentzat> dire zeinentzat aphainkuak baitire.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
Basque: Bainan ene eskuinean edo ezkerrean jartzea, ez dago niri ematea; bainan toki hekiek hainentzat dire <zeinentzat> aphainkuak baitire.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Alabainan gizonaren Semea ere ethorri da, ez zerbitzatua izateko; bai ordean zerbitzatzera, eta hainitzen berrerospenetan bere biziaren ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Alabainan gizonaren Semea ere ethorri da, ez <zerbitzatua izateko>; bai ordean zerbitzatzera, eta hainitzen berrerospenetan bere biziaren ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Alabainan gizonaren Semea ere ethorri da, ez zerbitzatua izateko; bai ordean <zerbitzatzera>, eta hainitzen berrerospenetan bere biziaren ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Alabainan gizonaren Semea ere ethorri da, ez zerbitzatua izateko; bai ordean zerbitzatzera, eta hainitzen berrerospenetan bere biziaren ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Alabainan gizonaren Semea ere ethorri da, ez zerbitzatua izateko; bai ordean zerbitzatzera, eta hainitzen berrerospenetan bere biziaren ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Alabainan gizonaren Semea ere ethorri da, ez zerbitzatua izateko; bai ordean zerbitzatzera, eta hainitzen berrerospenetan <bere biziaren ematera>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou son of David, have mercy on me.
Basque: Eta larderiatzen zuten askok, ixilarazi beharrez. Bainan harek hainitz gorago egiten zuen oihu: Dabiden semea, urrikal niri.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.
Basque: Eta Jesusek hitza harturik, erran zioen: Zer nahi duzu egin dezazudan? Itsuak berriz, erran zuen: Ikhus dezadan, Jauna.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Basque: Eta irakhasten zuen, hekiei erranez: Ez othe da bada iskribatua: Ene etxea, jendaki guzietan deithuko da othoitzeko etxea? Zuek ordean huntarik ohoin zilho bat egin duzue.
remarks_sem: versions differ. Perhaps here English preposition OF expresses the agent?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin
