English: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
Basque: <Hargatik> derratzuet, edozein gauza othoitzean galda dezazuen, sinhetsazue izanen duzuela, eta izanen duzue.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
Basque: Bainan othoitzean jarriko zaretenean, <norbaiten kontra> balin baduzue zerbait, barkha zazue, zuen Aita zeruetan denak ere barkha detzatzuen zuen gaizkiak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?
Basque: Eta erraten diote: Zer indarrez egiten ditutzu horiek eta nork eman darotzu horien egiteko ahala?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
Basque: Bainan gogoetaka zauden beren baithan, egiten zutelarik: Baderragu: Zerutikakoa; erranen daroku: <Zergatik> ez diozue beraz eman sinheste?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Erran bagineza: Gizonen ganikakoa; <populuaren> beldur izateko ginduke; guziek alabainan egiazko profetatzat zadukaten Joanes.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Erran bagineza: Gizonen ganikakoa; populuaren beldur izateko ginduke; guziek alabainan egiazko <profetatzat> zadukaten Joanes.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
Basque: Eta ordua ethorri zenean, etxetiarretara bidali zuen sehi bat, mahastiko fruituetarik har zezan hari zagokiona.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.
Basque: Beraz nola baitzuen oraino seme bakhar bat bere bihotzekoa, hura ere igorri zioten, zerralarik: <Ene semearentzat> herabe izanen ahal dire.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Eta Jesusen hartzea bilhatzen zuten; ezagutu zuten ezik, hekiek zituela begitan parabola horren erratean; bainan populuaren ziren beldur, eta hura han utzirik, goan ziren beren alde.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Eta Jesusen hartzea bilhatzen zuten; ezagutu zuten ezik, hekiek zituela begitan parabola horren erratean; bainan <populuaren> ziren beldur, eta hura han utzirik, goan ziren beren alde.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Eta Jesusen hartzea bilhatzen zuten; ezagutu zuten ezik, hekiek zituela begitan parabola horren erratean; bainan populuaren ziren beldur, eta hura han utzirik, goan ziren beren alde.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, to catch him in his words.
Basque: Gero bidaltzen diozkate Farisauetarik eta Herodestiarretarik zenbait, <hura bere hitzetan atzeman beharrez>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when they were come, they say unto him, Master, we know that thou art true, and carest for no man: for thou regardest not the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth: Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar, or not?
Basque: Haukiek, ethorririk, erraten diote. Nausia, badakigu zina zarela; ezik etzare gizonen begitharteari begiratzen, bainan zintasunean irakhasten duzu Jainkoaren bidea. Zilhegi da Zesarri zergaren bihurtzea, ala ez diogu emanen?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Jesusek ezagutzen baitzuen hekien maltzurkeria, erraten diote: <Zergatik> nauzue bilhatzen? Emadazuet denario bat, ikhus dezadan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Jesusek ezagutzen baitzuen hekien maltzurkeria, erraten diote: Zergatik nauzue bilhatzen? Emadazuet denario bat, ikhus dezadan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: Nausia, iskribuz utzi izan daroku Moisesek: Norbaiten anaia hiltzera heldu bada, eta uzten badu emaztea eta haurrik ez, hainaren anaiak har beza haren emaztea, eta ondore eman biozo bere anaiari.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: Nausia, iskribuz utzi izan daroku Moisesek: Norbaiten anaia hiltzera heldu bada, eta uzten badu emaztea eta haurrik ez, hainaren anaiak har beza haren emaztea, eta ondore eman biozo bere anaiari.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
Basque: Eta tenploan irakhasten hari zelarik, erran zuen Jesusek: <Noletan> diote Iskribauek, Kristo Dabiden semea dela?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Basque: Zeinek, <othoitz luzeen aitzakian> iresten baitituzte alhargunen etxeak; hargatik hartuko dute juiamendu zorrotzagoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Basque: Zeinek, othoitz luzeen aitzakian iresten baitituzte alhargunen etxeak; <hargatik> hartuko dute juiamendu zorrotzagoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Ezen jauziko da populua populuaren kontra, erresuma erresumaren gainera; eta tokika izanen dire lur-ikharak eta goseteak. Horiek izanen dire minen hastapenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Ezen jauziko da populua <populuaren kontra>, erresuma erresumaren gainera; eta tokika izanen dire lur-ikharak eta goseteak. Horiek izanen dire minen hastapenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Ezen jauziko da populua populuaren kontra, erresuma erresumaren gainera; eta tokika izanen dire lur-ikharak eta goseteak. Horiek izanen dire minen hastapenak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Zuek ordean zuen buruen gainean zaudezte erne; ezen atheraturen zaituztete biltzarren aitzinera, eta zehatuak izanen zarete sinagogetan; buruzagien eta erregeen aitzinera agerturen zarete <ene ariaz> hekiei lekhukotasun egiteko.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Zuek ordean zuen buruen gainean zaudezte erne; ezen atheraturen zaituztete biltzarren aitzinera, eta zehatuak izanen zarete sinagogetan; buruzagien eta erregeen aitzinera agerturen zarete ene ariaz <hekiei lekhukotasun egiteko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
Basque: Eta lehenik Ebanjelioak behar du jendaki orotan izan erantzuna.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
Basque: Orduan berriz, heriotzeari emanen dio anaiak anaia, eta aitak semea; eta haurrak jauziko dire burhasoen gainera, eta heriotzez joko dituzte.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
Basque: Eta guziei gaitzirizkotan izanen zarete <ene izenaren ariaz>. Bainan bururaino ihardukiren duena, hura izanen da salbatua.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
Basque: Eta hegaztegi gainean dena ez bedi jauts etxera, ez-eta barnera sar bere etxetik <zerbaiten hartzeko>;
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
Basque: Eta landetan izanen dena ez bedi gibelerat itzul <bere soinekoaren bilha>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
Basque: <Ezen> egun hekietan izanen dire hanbateko hesturak, nolakorik Jainkoak egin munduaren hastapenetik hunat ez baita izan, ez izanen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
Basque: Eta Jaunak laburtu ez balitu egunak, gizon bat etzitakeen salbaturik; bainan egun hekiek laburtu ditu, <hautatu dituen hautetsien ariaz>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
Basque: Ezen jaikiko dire kristo-aizunak eta profeta-aizunak, zeinek eginen baitituzte sendagailak eta gauza harrigarriak, <enganatzeko>, ahal balitz, hautetsiak berak ere.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
Basque: Zaudezte <beraz> atzarririk (ez dakizue ezen noiz ethorriren den etxeko jauna, arratsean, ala gauaren erdian, ala oilaritean, ala goizean);
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
Basque: Bada, bi egunen buruan ziren Bazko eta Airisak; eta aphez nausiak eta Iskribauak bilha zabiltzan hean zer amarruz atzemanen eta hilaraziko zuten Jesus.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
Basque: Baziren bada, hori beren baithan gaizki khausitu zutenak, eta zerratenak: <Zertako> gal horrela gantzugailu hori?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
Basque: Ezen hori, hirur ehun denario baino gehiagotan sal zitakeen eta beharrei eman. Eta <emaztekiarentzat> erasian hari ziren.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Bainan Jesusek erran zioten: Utzazue; <zergatik> egiten diozue damurik? Niri hunek egina, ongi egina da.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Bainan Jesusek erran zioten: Utzazue; zergatik egiten diozue damurik? Niri hunek egina, ongi egina da.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
Basque: Ezen zuekin baditutzue bethi beharrak, eta ongia egiten ahal diozuete, nahi dukezuenean; ni ordean ez nauzue izanen bethi.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
Basque: Orduan Judas Iskariot, hamabietarik bat, aphez nausietara goan zen, <hekiei saltzeko Jesus>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
Basque: Eta airisetako lehen egunean, zeintan imolatzen baitzen Bazko bildotsa, dizipuluek erraten diote Jesusi: Norat nahi duzu goan gaitezen behar denaren zuri aphaintzera, jan dezazun Bazkoa?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran zioten: Hau da batasun berriko ene odola, <hainitzentzat> ixuriko dena.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erran zioten: Gau huntan guziek <ene ariaz> izanen duzue gaizbide; ezen iskribatua da: Joko dut artzaina, eta barraiatuko dire ardiak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.
Basque: Bada Piarresek erran zioen: Bertze guziak behaztopa baleitez ere <zure ariaz>, ni ez bederen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.
Basque: Eta erran zuen: Abba aita, ez da <zuretzat> ezinik; urrun zazu kalitza hau ene ganik; bainan ez bedi egin ene nahia, bai ordean zurea.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
Basque: Zaudezte erne eta othoitz egizue, sar etzaitezten lerrabidetan; ezen izpiritua gurbil da, bainan haragia erorkor.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Eta Jesus mintzatu zitzaioten, erraten ziotelarik: Ohoin baten gana bezala ezpatekin eta makhilekin ilkhi zarete ene hartzera.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Eta Jesus mintzatu zitzaioten, erraten ziotelarik: Ohoin baten gana bezala ezpatekin eta makhilekin ilkhi zarete <ene hartzera>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Bizkitartean aphez nausiak eta batzarre guzia <Jesusen kontra> lekhukotasunketa zabiltzan, hura hilarazi beharrez, eta etzuten aurkhitzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Bizkitartean aphez nausiak eta batzarre guzia Jesusen kontra lekhukotasunketa zabiltzan, <hura hilarazi beharrez>, eta etzuten aurkhitzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
Basque: Ezen hainitzek gezurrezko lekhukotasunak atheratzen zituzten <haren kontra>; bainan lekhukotasunak etziren hitz-batekoak.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
Basque: Azkenean, zenbaitek, jaikirik ekharri zuten gezurrezko lekhukotasun bat, ziotelarik:
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
Basque: Orduan, biltzarraren erdian xutiturik, aphez handiak erran zioen Jesusi: Ez duzu deusere ihardesten haukiek <zure kontra> atheratzen dituzten lekhukotasunei?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.
Basque: Eta aphez nausiek <asko gauzaz> hobendun egiten zuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
Basque: Eta Pilatok berriz galdatuz, erran zioen: Ez duzu deus ihardesten? Ikhusazu zenbat gaizki jazartzen darozkitzuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.
Basque: Bazakien alabainan aphez nausiek <bekhaizgoz> ezarri ziotela hura eskuetan.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
Basque: Azkenean Pilatok, <populuari atsegin egin beharrez>, utzi zioen Barrabas; eta Jesus, ordukoz azotatua, eman zioten gurutzefikatua izateko.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
Basque: Eta burlatu zuten ondoan, khendu zioten purpura, jauntzi ziozkaten bere soinekoak, eta <gurutzefikatzera> eraman zuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.
Basque: Eta gurutzefikatu zutenean, haren soinekoak berezi zituzten, zorthea arthikiz, nork zer eraman.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
Basque: Eta bederatzigarren orenean, Jesusek oihu handi batekin erran zuen: Eloi, Eloi, lamma sabaxthani? erran nahi baita: Ene Jainkoa, ene Jainkoa, >zeren> nauzu utzi?
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.
Basque: Eta larunbata iragan zenean Maria Magdalenak, eta Maria Jakoberenak, eta Salomek baltsamuak erosi zituzten, <Jesusen gantzutzera goateko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenik agertu zitzaioten hamekei, mahainean zirelarik; eta gaizkiak erran ziozkaten <beren sinhesgaiztasunaz> eta bihotz gogortasunaz, zeren biztua zela ikhusi zutenei etzioten sinhesterik eman.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
Basque: Azkenik agertu zitzaioten hamekei, mahainean zirelarik; eta gaizkiak erran ziozkaten beren sinhesgaiztasunaz eta <bihotz gogortasunaz>, zeren biztua zela ikhusi zutenei etzioten sinhesterik eman.
text: Gospel of Mark - Jesu-Kristoren Ebanjelio Saindua Marken arabera
author: Duvoisin

English: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
Basque: Joan zegoan eremuan bataiatzen ari zala, eta penitenziako bataioa predikatzen zuela <bekatuen barkaziorako>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And saying, The time is fulfilled, and the kingdom of God is at hand: repent ye, and believe the gospel.
Basque: Eta esaten zuela: Kunplitu da onezkero denbora, eta Jaungoikoaren erreñua alderatu da, <argatik> penitenzia egin ezazute, eta Ebanjelioari sinistu zaiozute.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also: for therefore came I forth.
Basque: Eta esan zien: Aldeko ballera eta errietara goazen, nik ere aietan predikatu dezadan, zeren <onetarako> etorri naizan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.
Basque: Eta nola ezin jarri zuten Jesusen aurrean, inguruan zegoan <jendetzagatik>, idiki zuten tellatua Jesus zegoan aldamenetik, eta zulotik beera jetxi zuten, elbarridun gizona zetzan oetxoa.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
Basque: Zer da onek esaten duena? Blasfematzen du. Nork, Jaungoikoak bakarrik baizik, bekatuak barkatu ditzake?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Why reason ye these things in your hearts?
Basque: Eta Jesusek, au bereala ezaguturik bere espirituarekin, onelako gogorazioak zerabiltzatela beren artean, esaten die: <Zergatik> darabiltzkizute zuen biotzetan onelako gogorazioak?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners, they said unto his disciples, How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners?
Basque: Eta Eskribak eta Fariseoak ikusirik publikano eta bekatariakin jaten zuela, bere ikasleai esaten zien: <Zergatik> zuen Maisuak publikano eta bekatariakin jaten eta edaten du?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast, but thy disciples fast not?
Basque: Eta Joanen ikasleak, eta Fariseoak barau egiten zaleak ziraden; eta etorri ziraden, eta esaten diote: <Zergatik> Joanen ikasleak, eta Fariseoak barauak egiten dituzte; zure ikasleak berriz, ez dute baraurik egiten?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles: else the new wine doth burst the bottles, and the wine is spilled, and the bottles will be marred: but new wine must be put into new bottles.
Basque: Eta iñork ez du ipintzen ardo berria zagi zarretan, bestela ardoak zagiak urratuko ditu, eta ardoa isuriko da, eta zagiak galduko dirade. <Argatik> ardo berria zagi berrietan ipiñi bear da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Behold, why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful?
Basque: Eta Fariseoak esaten zioten: <Nola> zure ikasleak larunbatean zillegi ez dana egiten dute?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Eta gañera esan zien: Larunbata <gizonarentzat> egin zan, eta ez gizona larunbatarentzat.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath:
Basque: Eta gañera esan zien: Larunbata gizonarentzat egin zan, eta ez gizona <larunbatarentzat>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
Basque: Eta gizonaren semea larunbataren ere jabea da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man,
Basque: Eta aserrearekin begiraturik berai inguruan, eta tristeturik <beren biotzeko itsutasunagatik>, esaten dio gizonari: Zure eskua luzatu ezazu. Eta luzatu zuen, eta sendatua gelditu zitzaion.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
Basque: Fariseoak bada, irtetzen ziradela, bereala Herodianoakin batzarrea egin zuten <bere kontra>, nola galduko ote zuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
Basque: Eta bere ikasleai esan zien, iduki zezatela prestatua ontzitxo bat, <jendetza andiagatik> ito etzetzaten.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Eta amabi autu zituen <berarekin egoteko>; eta predikatzera bialtzeko.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
Basque: Eta amabi autu zituen berarekin egoteko; eta <predikatzera bialtzeko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.
Basque: Eta bereak aditu zutenean, irten ziran <berari eltzera>, zeren esaten zuten: Zoratu zaio.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.
Basque: Eta baldin Satanas <bere kontra> jaikitzen bada, zatitua dago, eta ez dezake iraun; bere atzena aldean da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: No man can enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
Basque: Sendoaren etxean ez diteke iñor ere sartu <bere etxeko gauzak arrapatzera>, lenago sendoa lotzen ez badu, eta orduan bere etxeko gauzak arrapatu ditzake.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: Baña <Espiritu Santuaren kontra> blasfematzen duenak, ez du beñere barkaziorik izango, baizik betiko juizioaren diña izango da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation.
Basque: Bainan Izpiritu sainduaren kontra burho arthikitzen duenak ez du nihoiz-ere barkhamendurik izanen; bainan hobendun izanen da bethirainoko hobenaz.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta beste zati bat lur onean erori zan, eta ematen zuen frutu goratu, eta azia, eta zekarren batek, <bateko> ogeita amar, besteak bateko irurogei, eta besteak bateko eun.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta beste zati bat lur onean erori zan, eta ematen zuen frutu goratu, eta azia, eta zekarren batek, bateko ogeita amar, besteak <bateko> irurogei, eta besteak bateko eun.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta beste zati bat lur onean erori zan, eta ematen zuen frutu goratu, eta azia, eta zekarren batek, bateko ogeita amar, besteak bateko irurogei, eta besteak <bateko> eun.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And have no root in themselves, and so endure but for a time: afterward, when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word's sake, immediately they are offended.
Basque: Baña ez dute berakgan sustrairik botatzen, eta ala gutxi irautzen dute, eta gero <itzagatik> atsekabe edo persekuzioren bat datorrenean, bereala eskandalizatzen dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And these are they which are sown on good ground; such as hear the word, and receive it, and bring forth fruit, some thirtyfold, some sixty, and some an hundred.
Basque: Eta lur onean ereinak dirade, itza aditzen dutenak, eta artzen dutenak, eta frutua ematen dutenak, batek <bateko> ageita amar, besteak irurogei, eta besteak eun.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta esan zien: <Zeren> beldur zerate? Oraindikan ere federik ez al daukazute? Eta txit beldurtu ziran, eta elkarri esaten zioten: Zeñ ote da aizeak eta itsasoak ere obeditzen dioten au?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto them, Why are ye so fearful? how is it that ye have no faith?
Basque: Eta esan zien: Zeren beldur zerate? Oraindikan ere federik ez al daukazute? Eta txit beldurtu ziran, eta elkarri esaten zioten: Zeñ ote da aizeak eta itsasoak ere obeditzen dioten au?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.
Basque: Eta deadar eginik boz goratuarekin, esan zuen: Zer daukat nik zer ikusi zurekin Jesus, Jaungoiko txit goratuaren semea? <Jaungoikoaren beraren izenean> txit gogotik erregututzen dizut, ez nazazula arren oñazetu.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing.
Basque: Eta aldamen guzietara begiratzen zuen, au egin zuen <emakumea ikusteko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But the woman fearing and trembling, knowing what was done in her, came and fell down before him, and told him all the truth.
Basque: Emakumea berriz beldurturik, eta ikaraturik, jakinik beragan gertatu zana, etorri zan, eta bere aurrean auzpeztu zan, eta egia guztia esan zion.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: While he yet spake, there came from the ruler of the synagogue's house certain which said, Thy daughter is dead: why troublest thou the Master any further?
Basque: Oraindikan izketan ari zala etorri ziran sinagogako agintariaren etxekoak oni esatera: Zure alaba il da, <Zergatik> onezkero Erakusleari gogaiterazitzen diozu?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when he was come in, he saith unto them, Why make ye this ado, and weep? the damsel is not dead, but sleepeth.
Basque: Eta sarturik, esaten die: <Zergatik> alako moduan atsekabetzen zerate, eta negar egiten dezute? Neskatxa ez dago illa, baizik lo datza.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Is not this the carpenter, the son of Mary, the brother of James, and Joses, and of Juda, and Simon? and are not his sisters here with us? And they were offended at him.
Basque: Ez al da au langille hura, Santiagoren, eta Joseren, eta Judasen, eta Simonen anaia? Eta bere arrebak emen, gure artean ez al dirade bizi? Eta eskandalizatzen ziraden <beragan>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he marvelled because of their unbelief.
Basque: Eta <aien sinisgogortasunagatik> miresten zan, eta inguruetako errietatik zebillan erakutsiak ematen.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey, save a staff only; no scrip, no bread, no money in their purse:
Basque: Eta agindu zien ezerere ez eramateko bidean, baizik eskumakilla; ez zakutorik, ez ogirik, ez dirurik gerriualean.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta artzen etzaituzten, eta aditzen etzaituzten edozeñere tokitan, ateratzen zeratela andik, zuen oñetakoetako autsa astindu ezazute beren kontrako <testigantzan>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them.
Basque: Eta artzen etzaituzten, eta aditzen etzaituzten edozeñere tokitan, ateratzen zeratela andik, zuen oñetakoetako autsa astindu ezazute <beren kontrako> testigantzan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And king Herod heard of him; (for his name was spread abroad:) and he said, That John the Baptist was risen from the dead, and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.
Basque: Eta aditurik gauza oiek Herodes erregeak (zeren Jesusen izena otspatsua egin zan) esaten zuen: Noaski Juan Bautista illen artetik biztu da, eta <argatik> mirariak egiteko indarra dauka.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Zeren Herodesek berak bialdu zituen mandatariak, eta arrapatu zuen Juan, eta lotuta, jarri zuen karzelan, Herodias, <bere anaia Filiporen emazteagatik>, zeñarekin ezkondu zan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John, and bound him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife: for he had married her.
Basque: Zeren Herodesek berak bialdu zituen mandatariak, eta arrapatu zuen Juan, eta lotuta, jarri zuen karzelan, Herodias, bere anaia Filiporen emazteagatik, zeñarekin ezkondu zan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him, and would have killed him; but she could not:
Basque: Herodiasek berriz, Juani azeloak jartzen ziozkan, eta nai zuen il, baña ezin zuen.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Eta erregea tristetu zan, baña <juramentuagatik>, eta elkarrekin eserita zeudenen begiruneagatik, etzuen neskatxa tristetu nai izan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Eta erregea tristetu zan, baña juramentuagatik, eta <elkarrekin eserita zeudenen begiruneagatik>, etzuen neskatxa tristetu nai izan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the king was exceeding sorry; yet for his oath's sake, and for their sakes which sat with him, he would not reject her.
Basque: Eta erregea tristetu zan, baña juramentuagatik, eta <elkarrekin eserita zeudenen begiruneagatik>, etzuen neskatxa tristetu nai izan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?
Basque: Eta berak erantzuten ziela, esan zien: Eman zaiezute zuek berai jaten. Eta berak esan zioten: Goazen bada, eta berreun dirurekin ogiak erosi ditzagun, eta berai jaten emango diegu.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled, that is to say, with unwashen, hands, they found fault.
Basque: Eta ikusi zutenean bere ikasleetatik batzuek, esku zikiñakin, au da, eskuak garbitu gabe, jaten zutela, <augatik> gaizki esan zuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Eta Fariseoak eta Eskribak galdetzen zioten: <Zergatik> zure ikasleak ez dituzte zaitzen anziñakoen erakutsiak, baizik eskuak garbitu gabe jaten dute?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him, Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders, but eat bread with unwashen hands?
Basque: Eta Fariseoak eta Eskribak galdetzen zioten: Zergatik zure ikasleak ez dituzte zaitzen anziñakoen erakutsiak, baizik eskuak garbitu gabe jaten dute?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: He answered and said unto them, Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites, as it is written, This people honoureth me with their lips, but their heart is far from me.
Basque: Eta berak erantzuten zuela, esan zien: O hipokritak! Ongi profetizatu zuen <zuekgatik> Isaiasek, eskribatua utzi zuen gauza onetan. Erri onek ezpañakin onratzen nau, baña beren biotza nigandik urrutian dago.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.
Basque: Eta gañera esaten zien: Ederki desegiten dezute Jaungoikoaren agintea, <anziñakoetatik daukazuten erakutsia zaitzeagatik>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Basque: Eta zuek esaten dezute: Gizonak aitari, edo amari esango balio: Nigatik Jaungoikoari eskeñtzen diodan edozeñere Korban, (au da, doañ) <zure onerako> izango da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Basque: Eta zuek esaten dezute: Gizonak aitari, edo amari esango balio: <Nigatik> Jaungoikoari eskeñtzen diodan edozeñere Korban, (au da, doañ) zure onerako izango da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.
Basque: Eta zuek esaten dezute: Gizonak aitari, edo amari esango balio: <Nigatik> Jaungoikoari eskeñtzen diodan edozeñere Korban, (au da, doañ) zure onerako izango da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother;
Basque: Onenbesterekin ez dauka ezerere egin bearrik <bere aitaren, edo bere amaren alde> ta onean,
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition, which ye have delivered: and many such like things do ye.
Basque: Onela utsean utzitzen dezutela Jaungoikoaren itza, <zuek zerok asmatutako erakutsi batgatik>, eta onen irudira beste gauza asko ere egiten dituzute.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto her, For this saying go thy way; the devil is gone out of thy daughter.
Basque: Eta Jesusek esan zion: <Esan dituzun itzakgatik> zoaz, zeren demonioa zure alabagandik irten dan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the Pharisees came forth, and began to question with him, seeking of him a sign from heaven, tempting him.
Basque: Eta atera ziran Fariseoak, eta asi ziran elean berarekin eskatzen ziotela, egin zitzaiela zeruko mirariren bat, tentatzen zutela.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he sighed deeply in his spirit, and saith, Why doth this generation seek after a sign? verily I say unto you, There shall no sign be given unto this generation.
Basque: Baña Jesusek bere biotzaren barrendik zizpuru bat eginik, esan zuen: Gizon arraza onek mirari bat <zergatik> eskatzen ote du? Egiaz esaten dizutet, jende orri miraria etzaiola emango.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Ezaguturik au Jesusek, esan zien: <Zertarako> dauzkazute gogorazioak, ogirik ez daukazutela? Oraindik ez al dezute ezagutzen, ez konprenditzen? Oraindik zuen biotza illundua al daukazute?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
Basque: Ezaguturik au Jesusek, esan zien: Zertarako dauzkazute gogorazioak, ogirik ez daukazutela? Oraindik ez al dezute ezagutzen, ez konprenditzen? Oraindik zuen biotza illundua al daukazute?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.
Basque: Nola bost ogi txikitu nituen, eta <bost milla gizoni> eman niezten? Zenbat saski, gelditu ziran ogi zatiz beteak bildu ziñituzten orduan? Berak esaten diote: Amabi.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.
Basque: Eta zazpi ogi <lau millaen artean> partitu nituenean, zenbat saski, gelditu ziran ogi zatiz bete zinduzten? Esaten diote: Zazpi.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him.
Basque: Eta txit gogorgiro galerazi zien, onelakorik <beragatik> iñori ere esatea.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Zeren bere anima salbatu nai duenak, galduko du; <nigatik> eta ebanjelioagatik bere anima galtzen duenak berriz, salbatuko du.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
Basque: Zeren bere anima salbatu nai duenak, galduko du; nigatik eta <ebanjelioagatik> bere anima galtzen duenak berriz, salbatuko du.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
Basque: Zeren, zer balioko dio gizonari mundu guztia irabazteak, bere animari kalte egiten badio?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: <Nigatik> eta nere dotrinagatik lotsatzen dana, erreñu adultero eta pekatari onen erdian, orobat gizonaren semea berarekin lotsatuko da, aingeru santuak lagun dituela bere Aitaren glorian datorrenean.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Nigatik eta <nere dotrinagatik> lotsatzen dana, erreñu adultero eta pekatari onen erdian, orobat gizonaren semea berarekin lotsatuko da, aingeru santuak lagun dituela bere Aitaren glorian datorrenean.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
Basque: Nigatik eta nere dotrinagatik lotsatzen dana, erreñu adultero eta pekatari onen erdian, orobat <gizonaren semea berarekin> lotsatuko da, aingeru santuak lagun dituela bere Aitaren glorian datorrenean.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Eta izketan asirik Pedro, Jesusi esan zion: Jauna, ongi da gu emen egotea, eta egin ditzagun iru bizileku, <zuretzat> bat, eta Moisesentzat beste bat, eta Eliasentzat beste bat.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Eta izketan asirik Pedro, Jesusi esan zion: Jauna, ongi da gu emen egotea, eta egin ditzagun iru bizileku, zuretzat bat, eta <Moisesentzat> beste bat, eta Eliasentzat beste bat.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
Basque: Eta izketan asirik Pedro, Jesusi esan zion: Jauna, ongi da gu emen egotea, eta egin ditzagun iru bizileku, zuretzat bat, eta Moisesentzat beste bat, eta <Eliasentzat> beste bat.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And they asked him, saying, Why say the scribes that Elias must first come?
Basque: Eta galdetzen zioten, esaten zutela: <Nola> bada Eskribak eta Fariseoak esaten dute, Eliasek lenago etorri bear duela?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
Basque: Eta berak erantzun zien: Elias egiaz etorriko da nere bigarren etorrera baño lenago, eta gauza guztiak beren tokietan jarriko ditu, eta <gizonaren semeagatik> eskribatua dagoan bezela, asko padezituko du, eta gutxitan idukia izango da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
Basque: Eta berak erantzun zien: Elias egiaz etorriko da nere bigarren etorrera baño lenago, eta gauza guztiak beren tokietan jarriko ditu, eta <gizonaren semeagatik> eskribatua dagoan bezela, asko padezituko du, eta gutxitan idukia izango da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But I say unto you, That Elias is indeed come, and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed, as it is written of him.
Basque: Baitaere esaten dizutet Elias etorria dala (eta berarekin nai zuten guztia egin zuten) <beragatik> eskribatua dagoan bezela.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
Basque: Eta Jauna etxean sartu zanean, bere ikasleak isiltxorikan galdetzen zioten: <Zergatik> guk ezin aurtiki izan degu?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name, receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me, receiveth not me, but him that sent me.
Basque: Aur oietatik bat <nere amorioz> artzen duenak, ni artzen nau, eta ni artzen nauenak, ez nau ni artzen, baizik ni bialdu ninduena.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But Jesus said, Forbid him not: for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name, that can lightly speak evil of me.
Basque: Eta Jesusek esan zion: Etzaiozute galerazi, zeren nere izenean mirariak egiten dituenak, ezin esango du gaizki laster <nigatik>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.
Basque: Zeñai erantzuten ziela Jesusek, esan zuen: <Zuen biotzeko gogortasunagatik> eskribatu zizuten aginte au.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;
Basque: <Argatik> gizonak utziko ditu bere aita, eta bere ama, eta bere emaztearekin bilduko da,
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
Basque: Eta berak esan zien: Bere emaztea utzi, eta beste batekin ezkontzen danak, <bere andrearen kontra> adulterioko bekatua egiten du.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
Basque: Eta Jesusek esan zion: <Zergatik> ona esaten didazu? Ez dago iñor ere onik, Jaungoikoa bakarrik baizik.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
Basque: Eta Pedro asi zitzaion esaten: Ona non guk gauza guztiak utzi ditugu, eta jarraitu dizugu.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Jesusek erantzuten zuela, esan zuen: Egiaz esaten dizutet, iñor ere ez dagoala utzi duenik etxea, edo anaiak, edo arrebak, edo aita, edo ama, edo semeak, edo kanpolurrak <nigatik>, eta Ebanjelioa gatik,
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
Basque: Jesusek erantzuten zuela, esan zuen: Egiaz esaten dizutet, iñor ere ez dagoala utzi duenik etxea, edo anaiak, edo arrebak, edo aita, edo ama, edo semeak, edo kanpolurrak nigatik, eta <Ebanjelioa gatik>,
gloss: pour l'amour de moy et de l'evagile
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And James and John, the sons of Zebedee, come unto him, saying, Master, we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire.
Basque: Eta orduan alderatzen dira beragana Santiago eta Juan Zebedeoren semeak, esaten dutela: Erakuslea, nai degu eskatzen dizugun guztia egin dizaguzula.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?
Basque: Eta berak esan zien: Zer nai dezute, egin dizazutedan?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time, houses, and brethren, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and lands, with persecutions; and in the world to come eternal life.
Basque: Zeñak orain mundu onetan, eta persekuzioen artean artzen ez duenik eunetan anbat, utzi dituen etxeak, eta anaiak, eta arrebak, eta gurasoak, eta semeak, eta <soroakgatik>, eta beste munduan betiko bizitza.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
Basque: Esertzea ordea nere eskuiean, edo ezkerrean, ez dagokit neri ematea zuei, baizik prestatu zaiotenai.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when the ten heard it, they began to be much displeased with James and John.
Basque: Eta aditurik au amarrak, asi ziran <Santiago eta Juangatik> aserretzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: <Zeren> gizonaren semea ere etzan etorri bera serbitua izatera, baizik serbitzera, eta askoren erredenzioagatik bere bizitza ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Zeren gizonaren semea ere etzan etorri bera <serbitua izatera>, baizik serbitzera, eta askoren erredenzioagatik bere bizitza ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Zeren gizonaren semea ere etzan etorri bera serbitua izatera, baizik <serbitzera>, eta askoren erredenzioagatik bere bizitza ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Zeren gizonaren semea ere etzan etorri bera serbitua izatera, baizik serbitzera, eta <askoren erredenzioagatik> bere bizitza ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Zeren gizonaren semea ere etzan etorri bera serbitua izatera, baizik serbitzera, eta askoren erredenzioagatik bere bizitza ematera.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
Basque: Zeren gizonaren semea ere etzan etorri bera serbitua izatera, baizik serbitzera, eta askoren erredenzioagatik bere bizitza <ematera>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou son of David, have mercy on me.
Basque: Eta askok errierta egiten zion ixildu zedin. Berak berriz, deadar andiagoak egiten zituen, esaten zuela: Dabiden semea, nizaz urrikaldu zaite.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.
Basque: Eta Jesusek esan zion: Zer nai dezu egin dizazudan? Eta itsuak esan zion: Erakuslea, nik ikusi dizadala.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.
Basque: Eta erakutsiak ematen ziezten, esaten ziela: Ez al dago eskribitua, nere etxeari jende guziak orazioko etxearen izenarekin deituko diotela? Zuek berriz, lapurren ezkutatoki egin dezute.
remarks_sem: versions differ. Perhaps here English preposition OF expresses the agent?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
Basque: <Argatik> esaten dizutet, orazioan eskatzen dezuten guztia, sinistu ezazute artuko dezutela, eta guztia emango zazutela.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
Basque: Eta orazioan zaudetenean, <norbaiten kontra> ezertxoere badaukazute, aurrena barkatu zaiozute, zuen Aita zeruetan dagoanak ere, zuen bekatuak barkatu ditzatzuten.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?
Basque: Eta esaten diote: Zer eskubiderekin oiek egiten dituzu? Eta nork eman dizu eskubide au, gauza oiek egiteko?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
Basque: Eta berak beren artean gogorazioetan zeuden, esaten zutela: Esaten badiogu, zerutikoa, esango du: <Zergatik> bada etziñioten sinistu?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Esaten badegu, gizonakgandikoa, <erriaren> beldur gera, zeren guztiak sinistzen zuten, Juan profeta egiazkoa izan zala.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
Basque: Esaten badegu, gizonakgandikoa, erriaren beldur gera, zeren guztiak sinistzen zuten, Juan profeta egiazkoa izan zala.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
Basque: Eta bere denboran morroi bat bialdu zuen maizterrakgana, mastiaren frututik maizterrakgandik <errenta artzeko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.
Basque: Oraindikan bada, idukirik seme bakar bat txit maitatzen zuena, hura ere atzenean berakgana bialdu zuen, esaten zuela: <Nere semeari> bederik lotsaz begiratuko diote.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Eta bera arrapatzeko asmazioetan zebiltzan, baña erriaren beldur ziran, zeren ezagutu zuten <berakgana> parabola au zuzendu zuela, eta utzirik bera, joan ziran.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Eta bera arrapatzeko asmazioetan zebiltzan, baña <erriaren> beldur ziran, zeren ezagutu zuten berakgana parabola au zuzendu zuela, eta utzirik bera, joan ziran.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
Basque: Eta bera arrapatzeko asmazioetan zebiltzan, baña erriaren beldur ziran, zeren ezagutu zuten berakgana parabola au zuzendu zuela, eta utzirik bera, joan ziran.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, to catch him in his words.
Basque: Eta bialdu zituzten beragana Fariseoetatik, eta Herodestarretik batzuek, itzen batean arrapatu zezaten.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And when they were come, they say unto him, Master, we know that thou art true, and carest for no man: for thou regardest not the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth: Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar, or not?
Basque: Zeñak etortzen diradela, esaten diote: Erakuslea, guk badakigu egiatia zerala, eta bakoitza zeñ dan ez dezula begiratzen, eta ez oi zera ere egoten gizonen arpegia ikusten, baizik Jaungoikoaren bidea egian erakusten dezu, zillegi al da kotiza Zesarri ematea, ala ez diogu emango?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Jesusek jakinik aien gaiztakeria, esan zien: <Zergatik> tentatzen nazute? Ekarri zadazute dirua, ikusi dezadan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
Basque: Jesusek jakinik aien gaiztakeria, esan zien: Zergatik tentatzen nazute? Ekarri zadazute dirua, ikusi dezadan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answering said unto them, Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar's, and to God the things that are God's. And they marvelled at him.
Basque: Eta Jesusek erantzuten zuela, esan zien: Pagatu zaiozute bada Zesarrena dana, Zesarri; eta Jaungoikoarena dana Jaungoikoari. Eta <onegatik> miresten ziran.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: Erakuslea, Moisesek agindu zigun eskribuz, norbaiten anaia iltzen bada, bere emaztea Semerikan gabe utzitzen duela, bere anaiak artu dezala il zan anaiaren emaztea, bere anaiaren jatorria biztu dezan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
Basque: Erakuslea, Moisesek agindu zigun eskribuz, norbaiten anaia iltzen bada, bere emaztea Semerikan gabe utzitzen duela, bere anaiak artu dezala il zan anaiaren emaztea, bere anaiaren jatorria biztu dezan.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answering said unto them, Do ye not therefore err, because ye know not the scriptures, neither the power of God?
Basque: Eta erantzuten zuela Jesusek, esan zien: Ez al dezute ikusten <argatik> uts egiten dezutela, ez dakizutelako eskriturarik, eta ez daukazutelako Jaungoikoaren eskubidearen berririk?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
Basque: Eta Jesusek tenploan izketan ari zala, eta erakutsiak ematen zituela, esaten zuen: Eskribak <nola> esaten dute, Kristo Dabiden semea dala?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Basque: Zeñak andre alargunen etxeak iresten dituzten, berakgatik erregu luzeak egiten dituztelako aitzakiarekin. Oiek gogortasun andiagoarekin kastigatuak izango dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
Basque: Zeñak andre alargunen etxeak iresten dituzten, <berakgatik> erregu luzeak egiten dituztelako aitzakiarekin. Oiek gogortasun andiagoarekin kastigatuak izango dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: <Zeren> lendanaz jaikiko da jendea jendearen kontra, eta erreinua erreinuaren kontra, eta toki askotan lurdardarak eta gosea izango dirade. Oiek oñazeen asiera dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Zeren lendanaz jaikiko da jendea <jendearen kontra>, eta erreinua erreinuaren kontra, eta toki askotan lurdardarak eta gosea izango dirade. Oiek oñazeen asiera dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
Basque: Zeren lendanaz jaikiko da jendea jendearen kontra, eta erreinua <erreinuaren kontra>, eta toki askotan lurdardarak eta gosea izango dirade. Oiek oñazeen asiera dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Bitartean zaudete kontuan zuek zuen gañean, zeren batzarretara eramanak izango zerate, eta sinagogetan azotatuak, eta gobernatzalleen, eta erregeen aurrean egongo zerate <nigatik>, beren aurrean nere, eta nere dotrinaren testigantza emateko.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
Basque: Bitartean zaudete kontuan zuek zuen gañean, zeren batzarretara eramanak izango zerate, eta sinagogetan azotatuak, eta gobernatzalleen, eta erregeen aurrean egongo zerate nigatik, beren aurrean nere, eta <nere dotrinaren testigantza emateko>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
Basque: Baña lenago erreñu guztiai Ebanjelioa predikatua izan bear zaiote.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
Basque: Orduan anaiak anaia, eta aitak semea <eriotzarako> emango du, eta semeak gurasoen kontra jaikiko dirade, eta bizia kenduko diote.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
Basque: Orduan anaiak anaia, eta aitak semea eriotzarako emango du, eta semeak <gurasoen kontra> jaikiko dirade, eta bizia kenduko diote.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
Basque: Eta zuek <nere izenagatik> mundu guztiak gorrotatuak izango zerate. Baña atzeneraño fedean sendo irautzen duena, au izango da salbatua.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
Basque: Eta sabaiaren gañean arkitzen dana, ez bedi etxera jetxi, eta ez bedi ere sartu, <bere etxetik zerbait artzera>,
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
Basque: Eta kanpoan dagoana, ez bedi atzera itzuli <bere soñekoa artzera>.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
Basque: <Zeren> egun aietako atsekabeak izango dirade alakoak, nolakoak ikusi ez diraden Jaungoikoak mundua egin zuenetik, orain arteraño, eta ikusiko ere ez dirade.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
Basque: Eta Jaunak egun aiek laburtu ez balitu, gizonik batere etzan salbatuko, baña <berak autu zituen eskojituakgatik>, laburtu ditu.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
Basque: Zeren jaikiko diraden Kristo gezurrezkoak, eta profeta gezurrezkoak, zeñak egingo dituzten mirariak, eta gauza arrigarriak <engañatzeko>, al balitza, autuak berak ere.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
Basque: Zaudete bada, zuek ere beillan (<zeren> ez dakizuten etxearen jabea noiz etorriko dan, izango ote dan arratsaldean, ala gauaren erdian, ala ollarraren kantuan, ala egunsentian).
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
Basque: Bi egunen ondoan zan Pazkoa, noiz legamigabeak asitzen diraden, eta apaizburuak, eta Eskribak asmazio zerabiltzaten, nola Jesus saldukeriaz arrapatuko zuten, eta kenduko zioten bizia.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
Basque: Zeuden berriz an batzuek, gaizki zeramatenak beren artean, eta esaten zutenak: <Zergatik> okendu au alperrik galdu da?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
Basque: Zeren irureun diruan baño geiagoan okendu au saldu zitekean, eta dirua beartsuai emana izan litzakioten. Eta <emakumearen kontra> orroaka ari ziraden.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Baña Jesusek esan zien: Pakean utzi zaiozute emakume orri, <zergatik> atsekabetzen dezute? Zeren nerekin egin duen obra, ona da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
Basque: Baña Jesusek esan zien: Pakean utzi zaiozute emakume orri, zergatik atsekabetzen dezute? Zeren <nerekin> egin duen obra, ona da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
Basque: Zeren beartsuak beti zuekin dauzkazute, eta nai dezutenean berai ongi egin ziñitzakiekete; ni berriz beti ez naukazute.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
Basque: Eta Judas Iskariote amabietatik bat, apaizburuakgana joan zan, berai Jesus saltzeko asmazioakin.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
Basque: Eta legamigabeen lenbiziko egunean, zeñatan Pazkoako bildotsa il, eta eskeñtzen zan, ikasleak esaten diote: Nora joan gaitezela nai dezu, Pazkoako afaria <zuretzat> prestatzera?
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: The Son of man indeed goeth, as it is written of him: but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! good were it for that man if he had never been born.
Basque: Egia da, gizonaren semea, <beragatik> eskribatua dagoan bezela badijoala, baña ai! zeñ doakabea dan gizon hura, zeñaen bitartez gizonaren semea eriotzarako emana izango dan! Obe izango zan alako gizonarentzat, jaio ez balitza.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
Basque: Eta esan zien: Au da nere odola, testamentu berrikoa, <askogatik> isuria izango dana.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.
Basque: Eta Jesusek esan zien: Guztiok eskandalizatuko zerate <nigan> gau onetan, zeren eskribatua dagoen: Zaurituko det artzaia, eta ardiak barreiatuko dira.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.
Basque: Eta Pedrok esan zion: Guztiak <zugan> eskandalizatzen badira ere, ni ez.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
Basque: Beillan zaudete, eta orazio egin ezazute, tentazioan erori etzaitezen. Egiaz espiritua prestatua dago, baña aragia argala da.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Eta Jesusek izketan asitzen zala, esan zien: Ezpatakin eta makillakin lapur bat banintza bezela ni arrapatzera atera zerate:
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
Basque: Eta Jesusek izketan asitzen zala, esan zien: Ezpatakin eta makillakin lapur bat banintza bezela <ni arrapatzera> atera zerate:
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Apaizburuak berriz, eta batzarre guztia, <Jesusen kontra> testigantza baten billan zebiltzan bera eriotzara kondenatzeko, baña etzuten arkitzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
Basque: Apaizburuak berriz, eta batzarre guztia, Jesusen kontra testigantza baten billan zebiltzan <bera eriotzara kondenatzeko>, baña etzuten arkitzen.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
Basque: Zeren askok testigantza gezurrezkoak esaten bazituzten ere <bere kontra>, testigantzak etziraden egokiak.
text: Gospel of Mark - San Markosen Ebanjelioa
author: Uriarte

English: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
Basque: Eta batzuek jaikitzen ziradela <bere kontra>, gezurrezko testigantza au esaten zuten:
